Dogecoin (DOGE) Price Analysis Dogecoin faced huge liquidations of around $90 million in the past 24 hours that slashed the price from $0.466 to $0.412. However, the token has been displaying strength since the start of its rally in October and as a result, the bulls managed to defend the crucial support. Currently, the price is trading within a rising channel, suggesting the DOGE price may reclaim the lost levels to form new yearly highs soon. As seen in the above chart, the DOGE price has reclaimed it‚Äôs levels within the bullish pattern, suggesting the bulls to have remained vigilant. Meanwhile, the RSI displayed a bullish divergence while the MACD suggests a drop in the buying pressure. Moreover, a bullish crossover in the short term may have a huge positive impact in the long term, which could push the prices above the pivotal resistance around $0.478. Beyond this move, a rise above $0.5 could be imminent, forming highs at $0.53. Pepe (PEPE) Price Analysis Being different from the other memecoins, the PEPE price is displaying significant strength as the levels maintain a healthy upswing close to its ATH. Regardless of the current market turmoil, the popular memecoin is just 8% away from its highs and hence there is a high possibility of forming new highs later this week. The PEPE price is trading within a rising wedge and the current daily candle has hit the upper resistance and also tested the support. Therefore, with this, the price is expected to rise above $0.000027 in a short while, which may push the prices above $0.00003 shortly. title: 3 Reasons Why the Shiba Inu (SHIB) Price May Head North Soon
body: TL;DR Continuous token burns enhance SHIB‚Äôs scarcity, creating potential for long-term value growth. Technical and market trends also suggest SHIB might be poised for recovery despite recent declines. Time for Rebound? The cryptocurrency sector endured a severe correction in the past 24 hours, with Shiba Inu (SHIB) being among the losers. Its price tumbled by over 12%, while its market capitalization briefly dipped below $15 billion. SHIB Price, Source: CoinGecko However, some essential factors suggest that SHIB might return to the upward trend soon. One example is the meme coin‚Äôs burn rate, which skyrocketed by more than 1,000% on a 24-hour scale, resulting in approximately 51.7 million tokens being destroyed . The USD equivalent of the stash might be insignificant , but continuous efforts in that field will reduce the circulating supply of Shiba Inu, potentially making it more valuable (assuming demand remains the same or heads north). Since adopting the program, the SHIB team and community have burned over 410.7 trillion tokens, leaving around 589.3 trillion in circulation. The second bullish element is Shiba Inu‚Äôs Relative Strength Index (RSI), which recently plunged below 30. The technical analysis tool measures the speed and change of price movements and varies from 0 to 100. Readings below 30 typically indicate that the asset is underbought, suggesting a higher likelihood of a potential rebound. On the other hand, anything above 70 suggests a possible correction. Last but not least , we will touch upon SHIB‚Äôs exchange netflow , which has been negative for the past three days (according to CryptoQuant‚Äôs data). This is considered bullish since it signals a potential shift from centralized platforms towards self-custody methods, hence reducing the immediate selling pressure. Bonus: Shibarium‚Äôs Advancement Shiba Inu‚Äôs layer-2 scaling solution ‚Äì Shibarium ‚Äì made the headlines earlier this week when it blasted through another milestone. As CryptoPotato reported , the total number of wallet addresses surpassed two million. Over the past several weeks, the network has been processing daily transaction into the millions, with their total number currently standing at over 630 million. Shibarium‚Äôs increased activity may attract new developers and users, which could bolster the overall visibility and adoption of SHIB. The post 3 Reasons Why the Shiba Inu (SHIB) Price May Head North Soon appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: El Salvador Plans To Weaken Bitcoin Policy To Unlock $1.3 Billion Loan From IMF
body: A new report suggests that El Salvador is coming closer to striking an agreement with the International Monetary Fund (IMF) on multi-billion dollar funding ‚Äî but it has to tweak some aspects of its contentious Bitcoin law in return. El Salvador To Scale Back Its BTC Ambitions According to a Dec. 9 report from the Financial Times citing people familiar with the matter, El Salvador expects to secure a $1.3 billion loan from the International Monetary Fund in the next two to three weeks. In return, the Salvadoran government will stop forcing merchants to accept Bitcoin as payment, making it a voluntary payment method instead of compulsory. If confirmed, the deal would unlock a total of $3.3 billion in loans from the World Bank and the Inter-American Development Bank, aimed at ‚Äúsupporting macroeconomic adjustment and structural reforms.‚Äù El Salvador Has Been Buying Bitcoin Since 2021 El Salvador made history in 2021 when it became the first country in the world to adopt Bitcoin as a legal tender , forcing businesses to accept the cryptocurrency if they had the technological means to do so. The impoverished Central American nation made its first 200 BTC buy on Sept. 6, 2021. The El Salvador government, led by its pro-Bitcoin president Nayib Bukele, has continued to purchase Bitcoin since, committing to acquire 1 BTC daily . The nation currently holds 5,932 BTC as of November 2024. With Bitcoin hitting $100,000 earlier this month, Bukele announced that the government‚Äôs Bitcoin stash was worth roughly $600 million , representing an impressive 126% increase. The IMF, however, has condemned the approach and issued multiple warnings over the years, citing ‚Äúa number of macroeconomic, financial, and legal issues.‚Äù The latest development comes as no surprise to some observers, as in October, the International Monetary Fund reiterated its recommendation to limit the scope of its Bitcoin legislation and adoption. Nevertheless, the legal modification is unlikely to significantly impact Bitcoin adoption in El Salvador, which has been to a certain extent, poor. Back in August, Bukele admitted that the country‚Äôs BTC experiment had mixed results, adding that the crypto had witnessed limited domestic adoption.

title: Cardano Price Eyes Rally To $4 If ADA Maintain This Support, Top Analyst Says
body: The recent dip in Cardano price to near $1 has sparked discussions in the broader crypto market, especially after the recent strong rally. It appears that the dip comes amid a retreat noted in the broader crypto market, indicating that investors are taking a pause ahead of the crucial economic releases. However, despite the recent dip, a top expert predicts ADA to hit $4 in the coming days if it holds a key support level. Top Analyst Predicts Cardano Price To Hit $4 The crypto market saw its biggest liquidation recently, with traders liquidating $1.76 billion in the last 24 hours. This has triggered immense selling pressure on the broader crypto market, with Bitcoin and the top altcoins taking the biggest hits. There was no exception for Cardano price as well, which saw a slump of nearly 10% during writing. However, despite the recent dip, top crypto market experts appear to have remained bullish on the future trajectory of the crypto. For context, Ali Martinez, a prominent figure in the crypto space, recently shared a price chart of ADA, citing its historical trends. The analyst has compared the recent price swings to its 2020 performance, saying that he would continue to accumulate ADA even if the price continue to slump. Source: Ali Martinez, X In addition, Martinez also hinted that the crypto is poised to hit $4 or even $6, which would allow traders to book profit. In his recent X post, he stated: ‚ÄúEven if it dips down to $0.76, I‚Äôm buying more and plan to book profits between $4 and $6.‚Äù What‚Äôs Next For ADA? ADA price today was down nearly 10% during writing and exchanged hands at $1.01. However, the crypto‚Äôs trading volume has rocketed 122% to $3.88 billion at the same time. Notably, the crypto has touched a 24-hour high of $1.15, while noting a monthly gain of 75%. Besides, CoinGlass data showed that Cardano Futures Open Interest slumped 25% amid a broader crypto market crash , indicating a waning risk-bet appetite of the investors. However, the Relative Strength Index for ADA at 53 suggests a neutral stance for the crypto. This indicates that the crypto could witness further gains. Source: TradingView Additionally, Martinez has highlighted a key trend for Cardano price, saying that the crypto has slipped below the ‚Äúcritical $1.20 support level.‚Äù He noted that around 93,000 addresses had purchased 2.54 billion ADA at this level. Besides, he also said that the next demand zone for the crypto stands at $1 now. Source: Ali Martinez, X In addition, the Cardano Foundation X handle was hacked recently, which has also sparked concerns in the market. The hackers have promoted a false token, saying that it would stop ADA withdrawals due to the US SEC crackdown. However, the team was quick to address the issues, which has boosted the market spirit. On the other hand, a recent analysis hints at a potential ADA rally to $2. Also, the analysis showed that the Cardano price trajectory remains bullish as long as it holds above the $0.644 support level, indicating that the crypto could witness further rally in the coming days. The post Cardano Price Eyes Rally To $4 If ADA Maintain This Support, Top Analyst Says appeared first on CoinGape .

title: New Solana staking coin M3M3 on Meteora draws investments, but unstaking may be a problem
body: A new token Meteora-backed token, M3M3 is building up hype with its combination of staking and meme community fundamentals. The asset hinges on strong hands holding for the long term, with the added security of locked tokens. The M3M3 token is a Solana asset that aims to combine meme hype with staking. The token has been heavily promoted by influencers, and a significant part of its supply already has been locked in staked positions. The new trend has already built up 10.4K followers on X, and a total of 19,523 holders . At this level, M3M3 resembles an early-stage meme token. This time around, new buyers are urged to also stake their tokens for rewards. Meteora boosts M3M3 for its native DEX token The appeal of M3M3 comes from Meteora, one of the rising DEX platforms on Solana. Meteora is not at the level of Raydium and Orca, but it has also benefitted from the meme token boom. The exchange has now introduced its native token, similar to RAY or JUP, tapping users seeking passive income. Meteora has set up three chief roles for M3M3 ‚Äì as a launchpad token for third-party startups, as a general staking token, and as a liquidity token for meme creators to boost their initial liquidity. M3M3 aimed to serve as a version of SOL specifically for the Meteora ecosystem. M3M3 was created with a supply of 999,999,926 tokens, of which 167,035,922 are already staked. It is precisely the staking use case that is the leading narrative for this asset. Meteora claims to have distributed more than $3.11M in staking rewards. The M3M3 staking comes with a warning ‚Äì whales are quickly making their entries. Commenters are also trying to enter the top 100 wallets, which are the only stakers that earn rewards. Its tokenomics model creates an inherent competition for the top spots, which adds to the demand for M3M3. Meteora, the token‚Äôs issuer, notes the new tokenomics allows holders to move beyond the PvP aggressive trading model, instead competing to buy more and take one of the valuable spots among the top 100 holders. Once a staker secures one of the spots, they earn both SOL payouts and additional M3M3. Once again, there is an incentive not to sell, but to hold. This type of tokenomics does not look for endless increments in buyer count but for competitive buying among holders, leading the underlying asset to trade higher. The M3M3 model resembles the Olympus DAO and its OHM staking token, which collapsed under its promised high APY. The other problem with the new token is the prevalence of insiders, who may be controlling the supply. There are no high-value whale wallets, but the supply has been split into wallets with exactly 0.75% of the supply, based on BubbleMaps data. Users find workaround for M3M3 unstaking issues In addition to the social media drive to stake more M3M3, the asset had a small technical glitch, which prevented immediate unstaking. The token‚Äôs front end unstaking link does not allow for withdrawals. The Meteora team, which claims to support the token, has not commented on the limitation or whether it is deliberate or a mistake. Users have found a workaround for the M3M3 unstaking limitation by removing a hard-coded value to release the tokens. One of the reasons for unstaking is the spectacular run of M3M3 as a short-term trading bet. M3M3 launched at $0.001 on December 4, quickly rallying above $0.12. The token is gaining speed and liquidity, potentially leading some early stakers to liquidate their holdings. M3M3 rallied strongly since its launch, while buyers were incentivized to hold with high rewards. M3M3 still has a market capitalization of just $125M, with $2.2M in locked liquidity. The staking rewards exceed the token‚Äôs market capitalization, which may further incentivize holders. However, M3M3 is also considered a relative risk due to its high reward rate. Meteora claims to be able to provide returns even if M3M3 market prices go lower, based on its DEX activity. Traders are also looking at M3M3, expecting its tokenomics model to lead it to a higher price range. Not all ecosystem participants will move in as buyers, and some will bet on the speculative value of the asset. The M3M3 model is spreading to other DEX and DeFi protocols, as a way of encouraging buying and long-term holding. From Zero to Web3 Pro: Your 90-Day Career Launch Plan

title: Hester Peirce Targets ‚ÄòOperation Chokepoint 2.0‚Äô with 3 Crypto Fixes

title: Crypto Market Cap Slumped by $300 Billion Amid BTC, Altcoin Massacre: Market Watch
body: Bitcoin faced another violent rejection at the six-digit entry mark, which pushed it south hard as the asset dumped toward $94,000 on Monday evening. The altcoins crashed even harder, with numerous double-digit price losers, before they were able to catch their breath and recover some ground. BTC‚Äôs Nosedive CryptoPotato reported yesterday morning that BTC had fallen further away from the $100,000 level after surging past $101,000 on Sunday. Hours later, though, the asset breached into six-digit territory, but it was a short-lived move. Although MicroStrategy announced another mindblowing bitcoin purchase, the cryptocurrency actually dumped hard in value and slumped by roughly six grand in hours. Thus, it plummeted toward $94,000 for the first time since last week‚Äôs leverage-induced crash. Nevertheless, the asset managed to bounce off almost immediately and now sits above $97,000. This massive volatility harmed over-leveraged traders, with more than 500,000 such market participants getting wrecked on a daily scale. The total value of liquidated positions is up to $1.6 billion, according to CoinGlass. For now, the BTC market cap has declined to $1.930 trillion. The silver lining is that its dominance over the alts has shot up to 53%, as most of them have suffered a lot. Bitcoin/Price/Chart 10.12.2024. Source: TradingView Alts in Red As mentioned above, many of the alts dumped harder than BTC, even though they have managed to bounce off their Monday evening bottoms. Still, some of the biggest losers on a daily scale include BRETT (-14%), WIF (-13%), WLD (-13%), EOS (-12.5%), GALA (-12.3%), SAND (-12%), and TAO (-12%). Larger-cap alts like ETH, SOL, and BNB have dropped by around 3-4%. XRP dumped beneath $2 briefly during the crash, and even though it stands at $2.2 now, it is still 7% down on the day. Numerous others posted violent declines over the past day, but here are those who stand the best chance to bounce off quicker, according to Santiment. The total crypto market cap went from $3.9 trillion to well below $3.6 trillion before settling at just over the latter. Thus, the metric is down by $300 billion daily. Cryptocurrency Market Overview. Source: Coin360 The post Crypto Market Cap Slumped by $300 Billion Amid BTC, Altcoin Massacre: Market Watch appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: US Treasury Calls Bitcoin Digital Gold ‚Äî Is the US Govt Set to Buy Trillions of Dollars Worth of BTC?
body: The US Treasury has named Bitcoin ‚ÄúDigital Gold‚Äù in a new report titled Digital Assets and the Treasury Market. The findings shared on the Treasury‚Äôs official website expand on how cryptocurrencies are changing the investment landscape despite their speculative nature. The government arm is looking to soften the situation before President-elect Donald Trump takes over the reins on January 20, 2025. Trump has famously pledged to create a strategic bitcoin reserve in the US, which the Treasury will be directly involved in. It remains to be seen whether Trump will follow through with his promise. If the US decides to act, trillions of dollars worth of treasury bills could be invested in Bitcoin. The Rise of Stablecoins The report also focuses on the rise of US stablecoins, especially USD Tether (USDT) and USD Coin (USDC). According to the findings, the rise in stablecoins has resulted in a modest increase in demand for short-dated treasuries. The stablecoin market is expected to witness further growth in the future, so it will need to be regulated strenuously. Tokenization The Treasury report also touched on the important tokenization aspect that has become one of the most well-known use cases of the Decentralized Ledger Technology (DLT) revolution. The report states that tokenizing Real World Assets (RWA) across interoperable blockchains will considerably benefit this process and unleash new economic arrangements and opportunities. Key US Treasury Projects, Including Tokenizing US Treasuries The American Treasury focuses on projects like tokenized treasury repo, tokenized treasury funds, and digital asset treasury tokenizations. The report lists the major benefits of using this new approach, including improved collateral management, increased liquidity, improved clearing and settlement, and more. Significant downsides reported include technological risks, operability risks, and legal and economic uncertainty due to the nature of the digital currency economy. The Future The US Treasury seems eager to take advantage of the crypto revolution and devise a solution that works in its favor. However, the report itself doesn‚Äôt trust public blockchain networks for tokenization and other advancements. For this, the department plans to introduce a government-managed private blockchain. Overall, the report proposes a cautious approach by the government as the blockchain sector is extremely volatile. However, investing directly in Bitcoin is no longer a farce. Donald Trump‚Äôs second presidency beckons, resulting in seismic changes to the status quo of America‚Äôs coffers.

title: Bitcoin Whales Snap Up $2 Billion in BTC as $200,000 Predictions Gain Momentum
body: Bitcoin (BTC) is once again capturing attention as whales capitalize on the market‚Äôs current dynamics. Notably, over the past 24 hours, these large-scale investors have purchased an astonishing 20,000 BTC, valued at $2 billion. Popular crypto analyst Ali Martinez highlighted this activity on Saturday, tweeting, ‚ÄúBitcoin whale accumulation is going parabolic. They just bought another 20,000 BTC in the last 24 hours, valued at $2 billion.‚Äù This accumulation surge follows another revelation Martinez made on December 4th: ‚ÄúAround 400 new Bitcoin whales, holding between 100 and 10,000 BTC, have joined the network in the last two weeks.‚Äù The sudden influx of whale buying follows a volatile week in the Bitcoin market. From December 5 to 6, Bitcoin‚Äôs price plummeted from a record high of $103,900 to $90,500, a staggering 13.98% drop, before stabilizing around $98,000. The surge in whale activity, coupled with recent price growth, has sparked increasing speculation that Bitcoin could easily surpass the $200,000 mark in the coming months. An analyst at Bernstein suggests this milestone could be reached as early as 2025. Glassnode founders, popularly known as ‚ÄúNegtropic‚Äù on X, also expressed optimism despite Thursday‚Äôs flash crash following Bitcoin‚Äôs surge past $100,000 . They stated that Bitcoin‚Äôs recovery, driven by spot buying, suggests a break above the $98,500 resistance soon, potentially pushing prices toward the $104,000-$105,000 range in the short term. Elsewhere, data from CryptoQuant also highlights a surge in retail investor interest, with the 30-day demand change hitting its highest level since 2020. While increased retail participation often signals a market top, it also reflects growing enthusiasm, which could bolster Bitcoin‚Äôs next leg up. Another factor driving optimism is the trend of Bitcoin leaving exchanges. Significant negative exchange netflows, or Bitcoin moving from exchanges to private wallets, indicate ongoing accumulation by whales. This trend reduces the available supply on exchanges, creating favorable conditions for price increases. While the $200,000 target is gaining traction among bullish analysts, some experts warn of potential corrections. Jamie Coates, chief analyst at Real Vision, predicted a two-to-three-month consolidation phase as Bitcoin responds to macroeconomic factors. ‚ÄúBitcoin has hit new ATHs in the face of a deteriorating liquidity backdrop. If conditions worsen, the rally, while euphoric, can only last for a limited time. However, if conditions improve, the bull market could resume with greater momentum, ‚Äù Coates tweeted Friday. BTC traded at $97,300 at press time, reflecting a 1.18% drop in the past 24 hours.

title: Bitcoin tanks, altcoins bleed: Nearly $2 billion wiped out in liquidation frenzy
body: The global digital assets market dropped by over 5% as Bitcoin (BTC) saw a heavy sell-off in the last 24 hours. After surging post-election to a record $103,800, Bitcoin has struggled to hold six-figure levels while the crypto market shed around $200 billion overnight. The downturn was not exclusive to BTC as smaller tokens also nosedived by up to 15%, marking one of the year‚Äôs steepest intraday losses. The fear and greed index still depicts ‚ÄúExtreme Greed‚Äù as the cumulative crypto market cap stands at $3.46 trillion with a trading volume of $350 billion. Macro fears meet BTC chaos Data provided by Coinglass shows that more than 580k traders were liquidated in the last 24 hours. The total liquidation came in at $1.76 billion, with the largest single liquidated position of $19.69 million in ETH/USDT recorded on Binance. Over $1.6 billion worth of liquidated positions (90%) were long bets, which is a reflection of investors‚Äô hopes for the bullish run to continue. The market retraction comes ahead of the upcoming US inflation data. Fears from potential macroeconomic scenarios and BTC‚Äôs latest swing come together to form the perfect storm for traders. Bitcoin price dropped by over 4%, hitting the lower $95,000 zone and causing panic in the market. Data shows that more than $178 million worth of long and short bets got liquidated in the last 24 hours. Over $142 million worth of liquidations (80%) turned out to be long bets. This shows that traders were very much hopeful for BTC‚Äôs bullish rally to continue but the bears had different plans. BTC is still up by 120% on the year-to-date (YTD) basis and is trading at an average price of $97,455 as of press time. Its 24-hour trading volume stands at $116.2 billion. Trump-led rally vanishing? Speculation after Donald Trump‚Äôs pro-crypto agenda won him the US elections fueled a boom, but notorious crypto swings have led to rapid exits. Trump‚Äôs crypto pivot has excited investors with $10 billion flowing into US spot-Bitcoin ETFs since his election. Ripple‚Äôs XRP was one of the biggest losers of the day. After witnessing a solid upward run, XRP price dropped by over 10% in the last 24 hours, and it is down by 18% over the last 7 days. XRP is trading at an average price of $2.24 as of press time. Meme tokens like Dogecoin (DOGE) and smaller assets have struggled even worse, which may indicate the sector‚Äôs broad-based weakness. DOGE price went down by 6% while SHIB recorded a drop of 12% in the last 24 hours. Critics have highlighted the risks of wider crypto adoption under Trump, including market manipulation and regulatory uncertainty. From Zero to Web3 Pro: Your 90-Day Career Launch Plan

title: Coinbase sticks to conservative approach as meme coins make up 20% of its 2024 listings, analyst says
body: Coinbase has added 34 tokens to its listing roadmap in 2024, with meme coins making up 20% of the total, reflecting the exchange‚Äôs cautious approach despite the meme coin craze. As a publicly traded company, Coinbase ‚Äòs 2024 strategy for listing tokens seems to reflect a more measured approach compared to its rivals, with a selective focus on high-market-cap meme coins and a preference for Ethereum ( ETH ) and Base ( BASE ) networks rather than Solana ( SOL ) or BNB Chain (formerly Binance Smart Chain). https://twitter.com/ai_9684xtpa/status/1866367898501206452 In an X thread on Dec. 10, an on-chain analyst under alias ‚Äúai_9684xtpa‚Äù revealed that in 2024, Coinbase has added 34 tokens to its listing roadmap, with seven meme coins, making up 20.58% of the total. Moreover, about 71% of the listed meme coins had market values over $500 million, showing Coinbase focuses more on larger assets than its competitors. Meme coin listings on Coinbase have picked up since October, following a rise in interest around ‚Äúdog coins‚Äù as alternative tokens. This trend mirrors what‚Äôs happening on Binance, which has also added 14 meme coins since October. You might also like: Coinbase adds GIGA and TURBO to its asset roadmap While both exchanges share a peak in meme coin activity during this period, Coinbase‚Äôs listings reveal somewhat of a selective approach to network distribution, the analyst found. Unlike Binance, which sees over 60% of its meme coin listings on Solana, the majority (57%) of meme coins listed on Coinbase are on Ethereum, with Solana and Coinbase‚Äôs own layer 2 network, Base, each accounting for 28.6%. The analyst also noted that, unlike its competitor, Coinbase tends to exercise caution, with meme coin listings typically occurring at least a month later Binance‚Äôs. title: SEC Commissioner Calls for Clearer Crypto Regulations Under New Leadership
body: In a pivotal interview with Fox Business, SEC Commissioner Hester Peirce , known for her pro-crypto stance, outlined her vision for clearer regulations to foster growth and transparency in the cryptocurrency industry. As shared by Eleanor Terret on X (formerly Twitter) on December 10, 2024, Peirce identified key steps for achieving regulatory clarity under the SEC‚Äôs new leadership, advocating for a more collaborative and adaptable approach. This comes amid increasing calls for the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to modernize its stance on digital assets and provide a framework that aligns with the evolving needs of the crypto ecosystem. Peirce‚Äôs Proposed Steps for Regulatory Clarity Commissioner Peirce emphasized three critical measures to create a balanced and transparent regulatory environment for the crypto industry: 1. End Restrictive Policies Like ‚ÄúOperation Chokepoint 2.0‚Äù Peirce criticized restrictive measures that hinder the industry‚Äôs access to essential services such as custody and banking. Dubbed ‚ÄúOperation Chokepoint 2.0,‚Äù these policies have reportedly limited the ability of legitimate crypto businesses to operate effectively, deterring innovation and investment. 2. Define Assets Beyond the SEC‚Äôs Regulatory Scope A major point of contention within the industry is the ambiguity surrounding which digital assets qualify as securities. Peirce called for clear definitions to reduce uncertainty and streamline compliance efforts, ensuring that businesses can operate within the law without fear of unexpected enforcement actions. 3. Collaborate with Stakeholders Peirce advocated for open collaboration between the SEC, crypto entities, and the public to adapt existing rules to the unique characteristics of blockchain and cryptocurrency. This inclusive approach aims to balance innovation with investor protection. Why Regulatory Clarity Matters The cryptocurrency industry has long grappled with an uncertain regulatory environment in the United States. This lack of clarity has led to enforcement actions against major players and deterred potential investors. Key Benefits of Regulatory Clarity : Investor Confidence : Clear guidelines provide assurance to investors, encouraging capital inflows. Innovation Enablement : A well-defined framework fosters technological advancements and business growth. Global Competitiveness : By aligning its regulations with international standards, the U.S. can remain a leader in the global digital economy. The Role of New SEC Leadership The appointment of a new SEC Chair signals an opportunity for the agency to reset its approach to crypto regulations. Under new leadership, the SEC is positioned to shift from enforcement-driven tactics to a more constructive and forward-thinking regulatory strategy. Leadership Priorities : Modernizing outdated rules to accommodate blockchain technology. Engaging with international regulators to harmonize global crypto standards. Balancing the needs of innovation with the mandate of investor protection. Peirce‚Äôs recommendations align with these priorities, offering a roadmap for a more inclusive and effective regulatory framework. Challenges in Implementing a Crypto-Friendly Framework While Peirce‚Äôs proposals are well-received within the industry, implementing them is no small feat. The SEC must navigate several challenges: 1. Balancing Innovation with Risk Mitigation : The agency must ensure that investor protections are not compromised while accommodating new technologies. 2. Political and Bureaucratic Hurdles : Developing consensus within the government and regulatory agencies can be time-consuming and contentious. 3. Addressing Market Volatility : The crypto market‚Äôs inherent volatility poses challenges for crafting stable and predictable regulatory policies. Industry Response to Peirce‚Äôs Remarks Hester Peirce‚Äôs proactive stance has garnered widespread attention and support from the cryptocurrency community. What Experts Are Saying : Crypto Advocates : Praise Peirce for her forward-thinking approach, viewing her as a critical ally in the fight for fair and clear regulations. Skeptics : Argue that more stringent controls are necessary to protect retail investors and curb market manipulation. Neutral Observers : Emphasize the importance of balanced regulations that address risks while supporting growth. This mix of reactions highlights the complexity of achieving consensus in a highly polarized regulatory landscape. Global Context: Crypto Regulations Beyond the U.S. While the U.S. grapples with defining its crypto policy, other nations are forging ahead with their own regulatory frameworks. Examples of Global Progress : European Union : The EU‚Äôs Markets in Crypto-Assets (MiCA) regulation provides comprehensive guidelines for the industry. United Arab Emirates : The UAE has positioned itself as a crypto-friendly hub with clear licensing requirements for businesses. Singapore : Balances strict anti-money laundering measures with innovation-friendly policies, attracting global blockchain firms. The U.S. risks falling behind these regions if it fails to establish clear and competitive crypto regulations. The Path Forward for U.S. Crypto Regulations Peirce‚Äôs call for collaboration and transparency presents a roadmap for the SEC to move forward: Immediate Steps : End policies that unfairly restrict crypto businesses from accessing essential services. Provide interim guidance to clarify the classification of digital assets. Long-Term Goals : Create a dedicated crypto regulatory body or task force within the SEC. Work with Congress to develop comprehensive legislation that supports innovation while protecting investors. By taking these steps, the U.S. can foster a thriving crypto ecosystem that benefits businesses, investors, and the economy. Conclusion Hester Peirce‚Äôs remarks on the need for clearer crypto regulations come at a critical time for the industry. Her proposals to end restrictive policies, define regulatory boundaries, and engage with stakeholders offer a vision of progress and collaboration. Under the SEC‚Äôs new leadership, there is a unique opportunity to create a regulatory framework that balances innovation with investor protection, ensuring that the U.S. remains at the forefront of the global digital economy. To learn more about the innovative startups shaping the future of the crypto industry, explore our article on the latest news, where we delve into the most promising ventures and their potential to disrupt traditional industries.

title: Coinbase Market Share Drops to 6.6% as Binance Dominates with 44.1%
body: In November 2024, the cryptocurrency exchange landscape saw a significant shift as Coinbase‚Äôs market share declined to 6.6% , while Binance strengthened its position with a commanding 44.1% share , according to data from Kaiko , shared by Unfolded on X (formerly Twitter). This development underscores the ongoing competition among major crypto exchanges and raises questions about what‚Äôs driving the changing dynamics. This article explores the reasons behind Coinbase‚Äôs decline, Binance‚Äôs resurgence, and what these trends mean for the global cryptocurrency ecosystem. The Rise of Binance and the Fall of Coinbase Coinbase and Binance, two of the largest cryptocurrency exchanges globally, have long been seen as rivals in the race for market dominance. However, the latest data reveals a stark contrast in their recent trajectories: Coinbase‚Äôs Market Share Decline : Market Share at 6.6% : This is a significant drop, reflecting a struggle to retain its position amid growing competition. Regulatory Challenges : Coinbase has faced increased scrutiny from U.S. regulators, potentially deterring some users. Higher Fees : The platform‚Äôs higher transaction fees compared to Binance may also contribute to the decline. Binance‚Äôs Market Share Growth : Regains 44.1% Market Share : Binance remains the dominant player in the crypto exchange space, driven by its global reach and competitive offerings. Wide Range of Services : From spot trading to futures, Binance‚Äôs extensive product range attracts diverse traders. Lower Fees and Incentives : Binance‚Äôs user-friendly fee structure and promotional campaigns appeal to both retail and institutional traders. Factors Contributing to Coinbase‚Äôs Decline The decline in Coinbase‚Äôs market share can be attributed to several factors that have weakened its competitive edge in a rapidly evolving market: 1. Regulatory Pressures : As a U.S.-based exchange, Coinbase operates under strict regulatory oversight. Recent lawsuits and investigations by the SEC and other regulatory bodies have cast a shadow over its operations, creating uncertainty for users and investors. 2. Limited Global Presence : While Coinbase has expanded its services internationally, its footprint remains limited compared to Binance, which has established itself in numerous jurisdictions worldwide. 3. Fee Structure : Coinbase‚Äôs transaction fees are higher than those of Binance, making it less attractive to cost-conscious traders. This disparity is particularly impactful during periods of high trading activity. 4. Competition from Decentralized Exchanges (DEXs) : The rise of decentralized exchanges like Uniswap and PancakeSwap has drawn users away from centralized platforms like Coinbase, further eroding its market share. How Binance Maintains Its Dominance Binance‚Äôs ability to reclaim and maintain a 44.1% market share highlights its adaptability and strategic decision-making: 1. Global Strategy : Binance has strategically positioned itself in regions with high crypto adoption, such as Asia, Africa, and the Middle East, ensuring a steady influx of new users. 2. Diverse Offerings : In addition to traditional trading pairs, Binance provides staking, lending, futures, and options trading, catering to a broad spectrum of users. 3. Competitive Pricing : Binance‚Äôs low transaction fees and frequent promotional campaigns, such as trading fee discounts, keep users engaged and loyal. 4. Resilience Amid Regulatory Challenges : Despite regulatory scrutiny in certain regions, Binance has demonstrated resilience by adjusting its operations and enhancing compliance efforts, which has helped maintain user trust. The Role of Emerging Players and Trends While Coinbase and Binance dominate the centralized exchange landscape, the rise of decentralized finance (DeFi) platforms and emerging competitors is reshaping the market. Impact of Decentralized Exchanges (DEXs) : Growing Popularity : Platforms like Uniswap and Curve are attracting users with their decentralized, permissionless trading models. Regulatory Advantages : DEXs are less susceptible to regulatory pressures, making them appealing to certain traders. Emerging Centralized Competitors : KuCoin and Bybit : These exchanges are steadily increasing their market share by offering innovative products and services. Regional Exchanges : Platforms tailored to local markets, such as WazirX in India, are carving out niche spaces. What This Means for the Crypto Ecosystem The shifting market shares of Coinbase and Binance reflect broader trends in the cryptocurrency ecosystem: 1. Increasing Competition : The market is becoming more fragmented as users seek platforms that offer the best combination of features, fees, and security. 2. Regulatory Impact : Exchanges operating in jurisdictions with unclear or restrictive regulations face greater challenges, influencing user behavior. 3. User Preferences : Traders are increasingly prioritizing low fees, fast transactions, and diverse offerings, pressuring exchanges to innovate continually. Challenges and Opportunities Ahead Both Coinbase and Binance face unique challenges as they navigate the complexities of a rapidly growing and evolving industry: Challenges for Coinbase : Restoring user trust amid regulatory scrutiny. Expanding its global presence to compete with Binance. Revising its fee structure to remain competitive. Challenges for Binance : Managing regulatory compliance across multiple jurisdictions. Maintaining platform security and user trust amid its rapid growth. Addressing competition from decentralized platforms and emerging centralized exchanges. Conclusion The recent data from Kaiko highlights a pivotal moment in the cryptocurrency exchange market. Coinbase‚Äôs market share drop to 6.6% signals challenges in adapting to a highly competitive and evolving landscape, while Binance‚Äôs 44.1% dominance underscores its strategic strength and global appeal. As the cryptocurrency market matures, these trends offer valuable insights into how exchanges must innovate and adapt to meet the needs of an increasingly diverse user base. Whether through regulatory compliance, technological advancements, or improved user experience, the race for market dominance will continue to shape the future of digital finance. title: CZ Predicts Smaller Nations Will Lead in Adopting Bitcoin Reserves
body: At the Bitcoin MENA conference on December 10, 2024, Changpeng Zhao (CZ), the former CEO of Binance and a leading voice in the cryptocurrency space, made a bold prediction: smaller nations will spearhead the adoption of Bitcoin reserves . Speaking to a captivated audience, CZ suggested that Bitcoin‚Äôs qualities as a ‚Äúhard asset‚Äù make it an attractive addition to national reserves, particularly for nations looking to hedge against inflation and economic instability. This prediction aligns with recent discussions about Bitcoin‚Äôs growing role in geopolitics, including President-elect Donald Trump‚Äôs proposal for a U.S. national Bitcoin stockpile, as reported by Cointelegraph . While the concept has sparked debates, CZ‚Äôs statement adds weight to the argument that Bitcoin is poised to become a critical asset in global finance. Bitcoin as a Strategic Asset for Nations CZ‚Äôs assertion that smaller nations will lead the way in adopting Bitcoin reserves stems from Bitcoin‚Äôs unique attributes. As a decentralized and deflationary digital currency with a capped supply of 21 million coins, Bitcoin offers a store of value that is immune to government manipulation or devaluation. Why Bitcoin Appeals to Nations : Hedge Against Inflation : With rising global inflation, Bitcoin provides a deflationary alternative to fiat currencies. Economic Sovereignty : Smaller nations can reduce reliance on foreign currencies, such as the U.S. dollar, by diversifying their reserves. Digital Transformation : Embracing Bitcoin aligns with broader trends in digitizing financial systems. Smaller Nations Paving the Way CZ believes that smaller, economically agile nations are best positioned to adopt Bitcoin reserves. These countries often face challenges like volatile currencies, limited access to global financial markets, and dependency on remittances. By integrating Bitcoin into their national reserves, they can secure economic stability and attract investment. Examples of Potential Early Adopters : El Salvador : Already recognized as a pioneer after adopting Bitcoin as legal tender in 2021. Zimbabwe : Could turn to Bitcoin to combat hyperinflation and restore financial trust. Caribbean Nations : Known for embracing crypto to boost tourism and trade. China‚Äôs Potential Role in Bitcoin Adoption CZ also hinted at the possibility of China exploring Bitcoin reserves in the future. While China has historically maintained a restrictive stance on cryptocurrency, its recognition of Bitcoin as a ‚Äúhard asset‚Äù could pave the way for a strategic shift. Why China Might Consider Bitcoin : Diversifying Reserves : Bitcoin could complement China‚Äôs significant gold holdings and reduce dependency on the U.S. dollar. Technological Leadership : Embracing Bitcoin could enhance China‚Äôs influence in the digital currency space. Strategic Competition : With nations like the U.S. considering Bitcoin stockpiles, China may follow suit to maintain economic parity. President-elect Trump‚Äôs Bitcoin Stockpile Proposal CZ‚Äôs prediction aligns with President-elect Donald Trump‚Äôs recent proposal to establish a U.S. national Bitcoin stockpile. The idea has sparked heated debates, with proponents arguing that it would strengthen the U.S. economy and critics warning it could artificially inflate Bitcoin prices. Key Elements of Trump‚Äôs Proposal : Strategic Asset Accumulation : Advocates see Bitcoin as a hedge against economic volatility. Market Impact : Critics fear large-scale purchases could drive prices up, making Bitcoin less accessible for retail investors. Global Implications : A U.S. Bitcoin stockpile could set a precedent for other nations to follow. The Broader Geopolitical Implications of Bitcoin Reserves The adoption of Bitcoin reserves by nations represents a significant shift in global finance, potentially altering the dynamics of monetary policy and international trade. Geopolitical Benefits of Bitcoin Adoption : Economic Resilience : Bitcoin reserves can shield nations from external economic shocks. Decentralized Finance : Bitcoin reduces reliance on centralized banking systems. Global Influence : Early adopters may gain a competitive edge in the evolving digital economy. Challenges in Nation-Level Bitcoin Adoption While the prospects are promising, adopting Bitcoin reserves is not without challenges: Regulatory Uncertainty : Global regulations around Bitcoin remain inconsistent and complex. Price Volatility : Bitcoin‚Äôs historical price swings pose risks for nations seeking stability. Technical Infrastructure : Adopting Bitcoin requires robust digital infrastructure and cybersecurity measures. Despite these challenges, CZ‚Äôs optimism reflects growing confidence in Bitcoin‚Äôs ability to transcend its speculative roots and emerge as a strategic asset. CZ‚Äôs Track Record of Accurate Predictions Changpeng Zhao‚Äôs predictions often garner attention due to his track record of foresight in the crypto industry. As the founder of Binance, CZ has consistently demonstrated an ability to anticipate major trends. Notable Predictions That Came True : DeFi Growth : CZ accurately predicted the rise of decentralized finance in 2020. Regulatory Scrutiny : He foresaw the increased regulatory pressure on crypto exchanges and adapted Binance accordingly. Bitcoin‚Äôs 2021 Bull Run : CZ was among the first to forecast Bitcoin‚Äôs rise to over $60,000. His latest prediction further solidifies his reputation as a thought leader in the blockchain space. Community Reaction to CZ‚Äôs Statement The crypto community has responded enthusiastically to CZ‚Äôs prediction, with many highlighting the potential for Bitcoin to transform national economies. What Experts Are Saying : Proponents : View CZ‚Äôs statement as a validation of Bitcoin‚Äôs long-term value. Critics : Warn that national adoption could centralize Bitcoin holdings, undermining its decentralized ethos. Neutral Analysts : Emphasize the importance of regulatory clarity and infrastructure development for successful adoption. Conclusion Changpeng Zhao‚Äôs bold prediction at the Bitcoin MENA conference that smaller nations will lead in adopting Bitcoin reserves marks a pivotal moment in the evolution of cryptocurrency. With Bitcoin‚Äôs appeal as a ‚Äúhard asset,‚Äù its integration into national reserves could redefine global financial systems, offering economic resilience and strategic advantages. As geopolitical and economic pressures mount, CZ‚Äôs vision aligns with the growing trend of Bitcoin‚Äôs mainstream acceptance. While challenges like regulatory hurdles and volatility remain, the potential benefits make Bitcoin a compelling choice for nations seeking innovation and economic independence. title: Jetking Infotrain to Become First Indian Public Company to Buy Bitcoin
body: In a landmark announcement for India‚Äôs cryptocurrency landscape, Jetking Infotrain , a publicly listed IT company, revealed plans to adopt Bitcoin as a corporate treasury asset. As reported by U.Today on December 9, 2024, Jetking Infotrain aims to allocate a significant portion of its treasury assets to Bitcoin and other leading cryptocurrencies . This strategic move is designed to diversify the company‚Äôs holdings and serve as a hedge against inflation. The announcement makes Jetking Infotrain the first publicly traded Indian company to embrace Bitcoin in this capacity, marking a pivotal moment for corporate adoption of cryptocurrencies in India. A Game-Changing Move in Indian Finance Jetking Infotrain‚Äôs decision to adopt Bitcoin signals a seismic shift in how Indian companies perceive digital assets. Traditionally cautious about cryptocurrencies due to regulatory uncertainties, Indian businesses have largely stayed on the sidelines of the global crypto revolution. Jetking‚Äôs move could pave the way for other publicly listed companies in India to explore Bitcoin as a viable asset class. Why This Matters : Leadership in Innovation : Jetking Infotrain is positioning itself as a pioneer in corporate crypto adoption in India. Global Alignment : The move aligns with a global trend where companies like MicroStrategy and Tesla have incorporated Bitcoin into their treasuries. Inflation Hedge : Bitcoin‚Äôs limited supply makes it an attractive store of value amid inflationary pressures. Why Bitcoin? The Case for Corporate Treasury Bitcoin has emerged as a compelling asset for corporate treasuries worldwide. Companies view Bitcoin not only as a hedge against inflation but also as a means of diversifying their holdings. Key Benefits of Holding Bitcoin : Scarcity-Driven Value : Bitcoin‚Äôs fixed supply of 21 million coins ensures long-term scarcity, driving its appeal as a store of value. Decentralization : Unlike fiat currencies, Bitcoin is decentralized, reducing exposure to government monetary policies. Liquidity : Bitcoin‚Äôs market maturity has improved its liquidity, making it suitable for large-scale corporate transactions. Jetking Infotrain‚Äôs decision mirrors strategies adopted by global giants such as MicroStrategy , Tesla , and Square , who have all integrated Bitcoin into their financial frameworks. Jetking Infotrain: A Brief Overview Founded in 1990, Jetking Infotrain is a well-known IT training company in India, specializing in hardware and networking education. With its innovative approach to technology training, Jetking has consistently positioned itself as a forward-thinking organization. Key Milestones of Jetking Infotrain : Became a publicly listed company, reflecting its commitment to transparency and growth. Expanded its footprint across India with a strong focus on digital education. Continues to innovate by exploring emerging technologies like blockchain and cryptocurrency. The company‚Äôs decision to adopt Bitcoin reinforces its reputation as a leader in embracing cutting-edge technology. The Indian Regulatory Landscape India‚Äôs regulatory stance on cryptocurrencies has been evolving over the past few years. While the government has explored a Central Bank Digital Currency (CBDC) and issued warnings about unregulated crypto investments, it has yet to provide a comprehensive framework for cryptocurrency adoption. Key Regulatory Considerations : Taxation : Cryptocurrencies are subject to capital gains taxes, impacting corporate investments. Legal Ambiguity : The lack of clarity on crypto‚Äôs legal status in India creates potential risks for businesses. RBI‚Äôs Role : The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has historically been cautious about cryptocurrencies, though recent discussions indicate a more balanced approach. Jetking Infotrain‚Äôs move signals confidence in the growing acceptance of cryptocurrencies, even amid regulatory uncertainties. The Global Context: Corporate Adoption of Bitcoin Jetking Infotrain joins a growing list of companies worldwide that have integrated Bitcoin into their corporate treasuries. Notable Examples : MicroStrategy : Holds over 180,000 BTC, making it the largest corporate Bitcoin holder. Tesla : Allocated a portion of its reserves to Bitcoin in 2021, signaling confidence in its long-term value. Block (formerly Square) : Invested in Bitcoin as part of its mission to advance financial inclusion. These companies have demonstrated that holding Bitcoin can enhance a company‚Äôs balance sheet while signaling innovation to stakeholders. Unanswered Questions About Jetking‚Äôs Bitcoin Plans While the announcement is a significant step, Jetking Infotrain has yet to disclose certain details about its Bitcoin strategy: Position Size : The company has not revealed how much Bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies it plans to acquire. Timeline : There is no specific timeframe for the purchase or integration of these assets. Asset Mix : It remains unclear whether the focus will solely be on Bitcoin or include other digital assets like Ethereum or stablecoins. These unanswered questions leave room for speculation but also highlight the company‚Äôs cautious approach to rolling out its crypto strategy. Potential Risks and Rewards Adopting Bitcoin as a corporate treasury asset comes with both opportunities and challenges: Potential Rewards : Hedging Inflation : Bitcoin‚Äôs scarcity-driven value offers protection against inflationary pressures. Market Leadership : Early adoption could position Jetking as a thought leader in India‚Äôs corporate sector. Global Visibility : This move could enhance Jetking‚Äôs reputation on an international stage. Potential Risks : Regulatory Uncertainty : Indian regulations could impact the company‚Äôs ability to operate freely in the crypto space. Volatility : Bitcoin‚Äôs price fluctuations could pose risks to treasury stability. Market Sentiment : Negative sentiment or market corrections could impact the value of the company‚Äôs holdings. Despite these risks, Jetking Infotrain‚Äôs decision underscores its willingness to innovate and explore emerging financial strategies. Community and Industry Reactions Jetking‚Äôs announcement has sparked significant interest within the cryptocurrency community and beyond. What Are Experts Saying? Crypto Advocates : Applaud Jetking‚Äôs move as a step toward mainstream acceptance of Bitcoin in India. Traditional Investors : Caution about the risks associated with volatility and regulatory ambiguity. Regulators : Likely to scrutinize the decision as they shape India‚Äôs crypto policies. This mixed reaction reflects the broader debate about cryptocurrency‚Äôs role in corporate finance. Conclusion Jetking Infotrain‚Äôs decision to adopt Bitcoin as a corporate treasury asset marks a historic moment for India‚Äôs cryptocurrency ecosystem. As the first publicly listed Indian company to take this step, Jetking is breaking new ground, aligning with global trends, and signaling a shift in how Indian corporations view digital assets. While challenges like regulatory uncertainty and price volatility remain, the potential benefits of diversification, inflation hedging, and global visibility make this a bold and strategic move. Jetking Infotrain‚Äôs announcement could serve as a catalyst, inspiring other Indian companies to explore cryptocurrencies as part of their financial strategies. To learn more about the innovative startups shaping the future of the crypto industry, explore our article on the latest news , where we delve into the most promising ventures and their potential to disrupt traditional industries.

title: Will Bitcoin Price Recover After $1.7 Billion Liquidation Event?
body: Bitcoin (BTC) price has slipped below key trend line, suggesting the end to the short-term consoldiation. This drop signals the start of a correction and is likely to take BTC much lower before a recovery rally emerges. Let‚Äôs take a look at technicals, futures data and on-chain metrics to see what Bitcoin might do next. Before we step into any aspect of our analysis, let‚Äôs explore why Bitcoin crashed. Explaining December 9 Crypto Market Crash: A $1.7 Billion Liquidation Event During a raging bull run, the leverage present in the ecosystem climbs higher. This is true even in the traditional markets. With cryptocurrencies, this is dialied up to an eleven. As a result, when Bitcoin price slide 6% on late Monday, it caused altcoins to hemmorhage, triggering a flurry of liquidations due to the massive leverage. As a result of this cascade, the total liquidation reached a whopping $1.7 billion, according to data from CoinGlass . Crypto Market Liquidations Hit $1.7B on December 9 The leverage is one of the key drivers of such a massive crash and liquidation event. However, Google‚Äôs announcement of Willow, a quantum chip, could have also added some tailwind to the crash, some speculate. While Google‚Äôs new chip has made a huge step in advancing quantum chips, it is still far away from being a threat to Bitcoin‚Äôs encryption. Kevin Rose, former Google employee added, ‚ÄúGoogle‚Äôs Willow chip, while a significant advancement, comprises 105 qubits. We have a ways to go‚Ä¶ Nonetheless, this is a remarkable leap forward in quantum computing‚Äù Bitcoin Price Analysis: Will BTC Recover? Bitcoin‚Äôs four-week upsloping consolidation ended on December 9 after a 6.35% crash. This crash, albiet small, breached the inclined trend line, signaling an end to the consolidation and a potential start to the downtrend. Currently, BTC sits on the $97,205 support level, a breakdown of which could trigger a crash to $94,875 and $92,514 support levels. While BTC has ended the four-week consoldiation, it is sitll bullish on the short-term. Howerver, a breakdown of $92,514 would flip this bias favoring bears. Regardless, investors need to keep a close eye on $90K, a key psychological level. A bounce here could trigger a recovery rally, but a failure from bulls to defend this level could trigger a steep correction to $86,621 So, will BTC recover? If the $90k to $92.5k support levels hold, Bitcoin price should kickstart a recovery rally. BTC/USDT 4-hour chart The Open Interest data shows a decline from $65 billion on December 5 to $60 billion as of December 9. If the OI does not pick up moderately, then recovery bounce is unlikely to sustain. BTC Open Interest The 30-day Market Value to Realized Value (MVRV) indicator shows that it is close to zero, suggesting that there are no unrealized profits. While this is a positive sign, it is not a great time to buy yet or expect a recovery. When the 30-day MVRV indicator dips to 6% to 13%, BTC price has reversed. BTC 30-day MVRV Hence, the Bitcoin price prediction hints that a short-term recovery is highly unlikely. The data from price chart, open interest, and on-chain metrics all suggest a similar hesitation ‚Äì a BTC bounce here is not welcome. That said, investors need to be cautious not to FOMO as some altcoins are likely going to fly. The post Will Bitcoin Price Recover After $1.7 Billion Liquidation Event? appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Crypto Market Grows 45% in November, Surpassing $3.3 Trillion
body: The global cryptocurrency market experienced a 45% surge in November 2024 , reaching an impressive total market capitalization of $3.3 trillion , according to JPMorgan. This remarkable growth was largely driven by President-elect Donald Trump‚Äôs reelection, as reported by CoinDesk , which rejuvenated investor confidence and spurred a rally across digital assets. The resurgence in the crypto market also saw trading volumes more than double, while Bitcoin ETPs (exchange-traded products) recorded $7.6 billion in net sales . Additionally, mining profitability improved as Bitcoin‚Äôs price rally outpaced hashrate growth, creating a favorable environment for miners. A Political Catalyst: Trump‚Äôs Reelection Sparks Market Optimism President-elect Donald Trump‚Äôs victory in the 2024 U.S. presidential election played a pivotal role in the cryptocurrency market‚Äôs explosive growth last month. Trump‚Äôs administration has historically had a mixed stance on digital assets, but his reelection has been perceived as a signal for reduced regulatory pressure and a more pro-business environment, which has rekindled interest in crypto investments. Why Trump‚Äôs Reelection Matters to Crypto : Market Confidence : Political stability often correlates with investor confidence, encouraging risk-on behavior in alternative asset classes. Regulatory Outlook : The expectation of a business-friendly approach under Trump has led to speculation that crypto regulations may be softened or streamlined. Institutional Participation : Clearer regulatory policies could pave the way for more institutional capital to flow into the crypto market. Bitcoin Leads the Charge Bitcoin, the leading cryptocurrency, was at the forefront of this market surge. Its price rally significantly contributed to the broader market‚Äôs growth, with Bitcoin ETPs witnessing $7.6 billion in net sales , reflecting heightened interest from institutional and retail investors alike. Key Highlights for Bitcoin in November : Price Rally : Bitcoin‚Äôs robust price growth drove market enthusiasm, setting a positive tone for altcoins. Trading Volumes : More than doubled, signaling heightened investor activity across exchanges. Mining Profitability : Improved as the price rally outpaced the growth in network hashrate, creating favorable conditions for miners. Crypto Market Cap Hits $3.3 Trillion The 45% increase in the crypto market cap represents one of the most significant monthly growth periods in 2024, bringing the total to $3.3 trillion. This milestone underscores the sector‚Äôs resilience and its ability to rebound from regulatory challenges and market downturns. What‚Äôs Behind the Growth? Institutional Inflows : Major players like asset management firms and banks increased their exposure to digital assets. Retail Enthusiasm : Renewed optimism among retail investors further boosted demand across leading cryptocurrencies. Global Adoption : Countries exploring CBDCs (central bank digital currencies) and blockchain innovations added to the positive sentiment. Improved Mining Profitability November also brought good news for Bitcoin miners. As Bitcoin‚Äôs price surged, mining profitability improved, even as the network‚Äôs hashrate continued to climb. This trend highlights the delicate balance between price dynamics and network security. Factors Driving Mining Success : Outpacing Hashrate Growth : Bitcoin‚Äôs rally outstripped the growth in computational power, enhancing miner revenue. Energy Efficiency : Advances in mining technology have reduced costs, making operations more profitable. Geopolitical Shifts : With miners relocating to more favorable jurisdictions, operational stability has improved. Altcoins Join the Rally While Bitcoin took center stage, the altcoin market also benefited from November‚Äôs bullish sentiment. Ethereum, Solana, and Cardano, among others, recorded significant price increases as investors diversified their portfolios. Top Performers : Ethereum (ETH) : Continued to gain traction due to its use in decentralized applications and its position as the leading smart contract platform. Solana (SOL) : Outpaced many competitors in terms of transaction speed and cost, attracting new projects. Cardano (ADA) : Saw increased adoption in decentralized finance (DeFi) and enterprise applications. The Role of Bitcoin ETPs in Market Growth The impressive $7.6 billion in net sales recorded by Bitcoin ETPs underscores their growing role in bridging the gap between traditional financial markets and cryptocurrencies. These products allow institutional investors to gain exposure to Bitcoin without directly owning the asset, simplifying compliance and risk management. Why Bitcoin ETPs Are Crucial : Ease of Access : Provides a familiar vehicle for traditional investors. Liquidity Boost : Increased activity in ETPs contributes to overall market liquidity. Market Maturity : Signals growing acceptance of crypto as an asset class by mainstream financial institutions. Challenges Ahead for the Crypto Market While the crypto market‚Äôs performance in November was remarkable, it‚Äôs essential to consider potential risks that could impact its trajectory: Regulatory Uncertainty : Despite Trump‚Äôs perceived pro-business stance, regulatory clarity remains a pressing issue. Market Volatility : The crypto market‚Äôs historical tendency for sharp corrections could lead to sudden price swings. Global Economic Factors : Rising interest rates or geopolitical tensions could influence investor sentiment. However, the industry‚Äôs resilience and innovation continue to position it for long-term growth. The Broader Implications of November‚Äôs Growth The 45% growth in November highlights a renewed appetite for digital assets, with implications for the broader financial ecosystem. This milestone suggests that cryptocurrencies are maturing into a significant asset class capable of attracting both retail and institutional capital. What‚Äôs Next for Crypto? Increased Adoption : More businesses and individuals are likely to integrate cryptocurrencies into their financial strategies. Technological Advancements : Innovations in blockchain technology will continue to enhance scalability and efficiency. Global Influence : Cryptocurrencies will play a central role in shaping the future of finance, commerce, and governance. Conclusion The cryptocurrency market‚Äôs 45% growth in November, reaching a record $3.3 trillion market cap, marks a pivotal moment in 2024. Bolstered by President-elect Trump‚Äôs reelection, rising trading volumes, and improved mining profitability, the crypto sector is entering a new phase of growth and adoption. title: Floki Releases No-Fee Crypto Debit Card, Boosting Token Fundamentals
body: Memecoin project Floki (FLOKI) released a zero-fee debit card in 31 European countries on Monday, with plans to expand the offering to other countries in the future.The debit card allows users to spend bitcoin (BTC), ether (ETH), USD Coin (USDC), tether (USDT), BNB Chain‚Äôs BNB and FLOKI globally at merchants that accept VISA or Mastercard. There are zero transaction and exchange rate fees, and it is compatible with over eight blockchain networks.A physical card costs $33, while a virtual card costs just over $10. A 2% top-up fee applies when transferring tokens to the spending account associated with the card.‚ÄúFLOKI holders can now directly off-ramp their tokens through a debit card that can be used with millions of merchants without having to worry about going through hassles to be able to spend their funds,‚Äù Floki lead developer B told CoinDesk in a Telegram message. ‚ÄúWe will also introduce a VIP card that will allow users to have card limits of up to 50K per day and 250K per month.‚ÄùB added that the cards will not be available in OFAC-sanctioned regions or where restricted by banks.Physical and virtual cards are currently available in Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovenia, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, and Switzerland.

title: Russian Lawmaker Proposes Strategic Bitcoin Reserve: Report
body: Anton Tkachev, a State Duma deputy from the New People Party, has formally proposed establishing a strategic Bitcoin reserve in Russia. Tkachev sent an appeal to Russian Finance Minister Anton Siluanov urging an assessment of the feasibility of creating such a reserve. Arguments in Support of the Initiative The document, cited by local media, highlights Bitcoin‚Äôs potential as an alternative to traditional currency reserves.¬†In the appeal, Tkachev addressed the finance minister, writing: ‚ÄúI ask you, dear Anton Germanovich, to assess the feasibility of creating a strategic Bitcoin reserve in Russia by analogy with state reserves in traditional currencies.¬†If this initiative is approved, I ask you to submit it to the government of the Russian Federation for further implementation.‚Äù His proposal outlines the challenges of reliance on traditional currencies susceptible to volatility, sanctions, and inflation. Tkachev explained that these vulnerabilities threaten Russia‚Äôs financial stability. He noted the need for innovative financial instruments, including alternative reserve assets independent of any single nation, to address modern geopolitical challenges. The report also emphasized the rising significance of cryptocurrencies in global trade. The official noted that they have become a critical tool for nations facing sanctions and limited access to traditional payment systems. He also highlighted the Central Bank of Russia‚Äôs ongoing efforts to trial cross-border crypto payments. Additionally, Tkachev pointed out Bitcoin‚Äôs performance, citing its rise to $100,000 in December 2024 as evidence of its potential as a store of value and a source of significant profits for state reserves. Putin Shows Public Support For Bitcoin The proposition follows comments by Russian President Vladimir Putin, who supported Bitcoin during the Investment Forum in Moscow on December 4. Putin described the cryptocurrency as an ‚Äúunstoppable technology‚Äù and endorsed its potential as a global reserve asset. The president criticized the U.S. for leveraging the dollar‚Äôs dominance to enforce political agendas. He cited Western nations‚Äô freezing of $300 billion in Russian reserves after the 2022 Ukraine war as a key factor driving countries to explore alternatives like Bitcoin. Emphasizing the resilience of digital currencies, Putin stated that no one can ban Bitcoin or other electronic payment systems, predicting their continued development as nations seek lower costs and improved reliability. This development aligns with a growing global trend of governments considering Bitcoin as a reserve asset. In the United States, recent months have seen increased interest in Bitcoin reserves following Donald Trump‚Äôs election win, with several states initiating related legislation. Vancouver Mayor Ken Sim recently announced plans to incorporate Bitcoin into the city‚Äôs investment portfolio, aiming to establish it as a crypto-friendly hub. Other international leaders, including Venezuelan opposition figure Mar√≠a Corina Machado and Polish presidential candidate S≈Çawomir Mentzen, have also championed the idea of Bitcoin reserves for their respective nations. The post Russian Lawmaker Proposes Strategic Bitcoin Reserve: Report appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Former Binance CEO CZ Predicts Bitcoin‚Äôs Price Will Skyrocket
body: The cryptocurrency world was abuzz on December 9, 2024, when Changpeng Zhao (CZ) , former CEO of Binance, made a bold declaration about Bitcoin. Speaking through a report shared by Bitcoin Magazine on X (formerly Twitter), CZ expressed his belief that Bitcoin‚Äôs price is set to ‚Äúgo to the moon.‚Äù This statement has reignited optimism in the market, sparking debates among investors and analysts alike about Bitcoin‚Äôs trajectory in the months and years ahead. As one of the most influential figures in the crypto industry, CZ‚Äôs predictions carry weight, particularly given his unparalleled experience in the blockchain and digital asset ecosystem. This article explores his statement, the factors influencing Bitcoin‚Äôs future, and why CZ‚Äôs perspective resonates so strongly with the crypto community. Changpeng Zhao: A Visionary Leader in Cryptocurrency Changpeng Zhao, better known as CZ, has become synonymous with cryptocurrency innovation. As the founder and former CEO of Binance, CZ has played a pivotal role in shaping the global crypto landscape. Binance, under his leadership, grew to become the largest cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume, offering a vast range of services to millions of users worldwide. Key Milestones in CZ‚Äôs Career : Founded Binance in 2017 : Propelled by a successful initial coin offering (ICO), Binance quickly rose to prominence. Advocated for Adoption : CZ has been a vocal proponent of digital asset adoption, emphasizing their role in democratizing financial systems. Navigated Regulatory Hurdles : During his tenure, CZ steered Binance through intense regulatory scrutiny, adapting the platform to ensure compliance in key markets. His insights and strategic decisions have cemented his reputation as a thought leader in the blockchain space, making his recent prediction about Bitcoin particularly noteworthy. The Context Behind CZ‚Äôs Bitcoin Prediction CZ‚Äôs declaration that Bitcoin is ‚Äúgoing to the moon‚Äù reflects his long-term confidence in the cryptocurrency‚Äôs potential. While Bitcoin has experienced its fair share of volatility, the underlying factors driving its value remain robust. Why CZ‚Äôs Confidence Matters : Market Authority : As a former leader of Binance, CZ has unparalleled access to market data and trends. Strategic Perspective : His ability to forecast and navigate shifts in the crypto space lends credibility to his predictions. Community Influence : With millions of followers and a global platform, CZ‚Äôs statements often shape market sentiment. Bitcoin‚Äôs Resilience Amid Market Challenges Bitcoin has consistently proven itself as a resilient asset, weathering market downturns and emerging stronger with each cycle. CZ‚Äôs bullish outlook aligns with Bitcoin‚Äôs historical trends of recovery and growth following periods of consolidation. Key Drivers of Bitcoin‚Äôs Growth : Scarcity : With a capped supply of 21 million coins, Bitcoin is inherently deflationary, driving long-term demand. Institutional Adoption : Companies like MicroStrategy, Tesla, and Square have embraced Bitcoin, signaling growing confidence in its value proposition. Global Acceptance : Bitcoin‚Äôs recognition as legal tender in countries like El Salvador highlights its increasing legitimacy. CZ‚Äôs Track Record of Market Predictions This is not the first time CZ has made headlines with bold predictions. Throughout his career, he has consistently demonstrated an ability to anticipate major market trends. Notable Predictions That Came True : The Rise of DeFi : In 2020, CZ predicted the rapid growth of decentralized finance (DeFi), which soon became one of the most transformative movements in the crypto sector. Regulatory Scrutiny : He foresaw increased government interest in regulating cryptocurrencies, prompting Binance to enhance its compliance efforts globally. Bitcoin‚Äôs 2021 Bull Run : CZ was among the first to suggest Bitcoin could surpass $60,000 during the market‚Äôs record-breaking rally. Given this track record, his latest prediction has further strengthened market confidence in Bitcoin‚Äôs future. The Current State of the Bitcoin Market As of December 2024, Bitcoin operates in a dynamic environment influenced by macroeconomic factors, regulatory developments, and technological advancements. Despite occasional pullbacks, Bitcoin‚Äôs long-term trajectory remains overwhelmingly positive. Market Highlights : Rising Hash Rate : The computational power securing Bitcoin‚Äôs network is at an all-time high, reflecting robust miner activity. Increasing User Adoption : From remittances to retail payments, Bitcoin‚Äôs use cases are expanding. Lightning Network Growth : This layer-2 solution is making Bitcoin transactions faster and more cost-effective, boosting its utility as a medium of exchange. Potential Challenges Facing Bitcoin While CZ‚Äôs prediction underscores optimism, Bitcoin‚Äôs journey is not without obstacles. It is essential to consider the potential risks and challenges that could impact its price trajectory. Key Challenges : Regulatory Pressures : Governments worldwide are introducing stricter regulations, which could dampen innovation and adoption. Market Volatility : As a relatively young asset class, Bitcoin is prone to significant price fluctuations. Technological Competition : Emerging blockchain projects with unique features could divert attention and investment away from Bitcoin. Despite these challenges, Bitcoin‚Äôs strong fundamentals and first-mover advantage position it well to maintain its dominance in the market. Community and Investor Reactions CZ‚Äôs optimistic statement has sparked lively discussions across social media platforms. From veteran investors to new market entrants, the crypto community has rallied behind his vision. What the Community Is Saying : Supporters : Many investors echo CZ‚Äôs sentiment, citing Bitcoin‚Äôs scarcity and increasing adoption as compelling reasons for its eventual price surge. Skeptics : Some analysts caution against relying solely on optimistic predictions, emphasizing the need for diversification and risk management. Regardless of differing opinions, CZ‚Äôs statement has undoubtedly reignited enthusiasm within the market. Why CZ‚Äôs Prediction Matters CZ‚Äôs bold proclamation comes at a critical time for Bitcoin, serving as a reminder of its transformative potential. His confidence reinforces the idea that Bitcoin is not just a speculative asset but a revolutionary technology capable of reshaping global finance. The Bigger Picture : Institutional Influence : Statements from influential leaders like CZ often pave the way for increased institutional participation. Long-Term Vision : CZ‚Äôs focus on Bitcoin‚Äôs future aligns with the broader movement toward decentralized financial systems. Conclusion Changpeng Zhao‚Äôs prediction that Bitcoin is set to ‚Äúgo to the moon‚Äù reflects a deep belief in the cryptocurrency‚Äôs enduring potential. As a pioneer in the blockchain space, CZ‚Äôs perspective carries significant weight, offering a sense of direction to both seasoned investors and newcomers to the market. While challenges remain, Bitcoin‚Äôs robust fundamentals, growing adoption, and technological advancements continue to position it as a leading asset in the global economy. CZ‚Äôs bold statement serves as a rallying cry, encouraging the crypto community to stay the course and believe in the transformative power of Bitcoin. title: Why Coinbase‚Äôs Memecoin Listing Strategy Focuses on Credibility, Not Fads
body: Coinbase‚Äôs cautious memecoin listings prioritize market stability and regulatory compliance. Unlike Binance, Coinbase favors higher-market-cap tokens for long-term growth potential. Ethereum leads Coinbase‚Äôs memecoin network distribution, with diverse blockchain support. In early 2024, Coinbase surprised the market by adding seven memecoins to its listing roadmap. This move reflected a strategic shift as the platform cautiously entered a space largely dominated by risk-tolerant competitors like Binance. Coinbase‚Äôs memecoin listings this year reveal a cautious yet calculated strategy compared to Binance‚Äôs aggressive approach, aligning with its reputation as a regulated exchange while balancing innovation and compliance. Coinbase‚Äôs Cautious Take on Memecoins: Conservative Yet Calculated Coinbase has added 34 tokens to its roadmap this year, with memecoins making up roughly 20.58%. The remaining tokens represent more established projects, with 71% having a market value exceeding $500 million. This selective strategy highlights Coinbase‚Äôs emphasis on tokens with proven credibility and market stability.
