title: Russian Lawmaker Proposes National Bitcoin Reserve to Counter Sanctions
body: In a groundbreaking proposal, Anton Tkachev , a member of Russia‚Äôs State Duma, has called for the establishment of a national Bitcoin reserve . The initiative aims to mitigate the economic impact of international sanctions and enhance Russia‚Äôs financial stability. Highlighting Bitcoin‚Äôs role as a resilient store of value and a potential tool for international trade, Tkachev‚Äôs proposal could mark a significant shift in Russia‚Äôs approach to cryptocurrency. As reported by Crypto Briefing on December 10, 2024, the move aligns with the Central Bank of Russia‚Äôs (CBR) ongoing efforts to integrate digital assets into cross-border payment systems. However, implementing such a policy would require substantial collaboration among financial regulators, government agencies, and policymakers. The Motivation Behind a National Bitcoin Reserve Russia‚Äôs push for a national Bitcoin reserve comes amid increasing geopolitical and economic challenges, including restricted access to global payment systems due to sanctions. Bitcoin‚Äôs decentralized nature and its utility in facilitating international trade have made it an attractive option for countries seeking alternatives to traditional financial infrastructure. Why Bitcoin? Store of Value : Bitcoin‚Äôs fixed supply and deflationary nature make it a reliable hedge against currency devaluation. Decentralization : As a decentralized digital currency, Bitcoin operates independently of central banks or governments, reducing vulnerabilities to sanctions. Utility in Trade : Bitcoin can facilitate cross-border transactions without reliance on SWIFT or other centralized payment systems. Russia‚Äôs Growing Interest in Digital Assets This proposal is not an isolated development. It reflects a broader trend in Russia‚Äôs evolving stance toward cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology: 1. Cross-Border Payment Systems The Central Bank of Russia has been actively exploring the use of digital assets to enable cross-border payments. This effort aims to bypass international sanctions and maintain trade relationships with partner nations. 2. National Cryptocurrency Developments Russia has also been developing its own central bank digital currency (CBDC) , the digital ruble , to enhance its financial infrastructure and reduce reliance on foreign currencies. 3. Legal and Regulatory Progress Recent legislative efforts have focused on creating a clearer regulatory framework for cryptocurrencies, signaling a gradual acceptance of digital assets within Russia‚Äôs financial system. Challenges in Implementing a National Bitcoin Reserve While the proposal offers significant advantages, establishing a national Bitcoin reserve would not be without challenges: 1. Policy and Regulatory Adjustments Russia‚Äôs current cryptocurrency regulations restrict certain activities, such as using crypto as a means of payment. Introducing a Bitcoin reserve would require policy changes to accommodate its use in government-level transactions. 2. Coordination Among Agencies The successful implementation of the proposal would require seamless coordination between the Central Bank, the Ministry of Finance, and other regulatory bodies. 3. Price Volatility Bitcoin‚Äôs price volatility could pose risks to financial stability if not managed carefully. Developing mechanisms to mitigate these risks would be critical. 4. International Scrutiny Adopting Bitcoin as a national reserve asset could attract further scrutiny from countries already imposing sanctions on Russia, potentially escalating geopolitical tensions. Global Implications of Russia‚Äôs Proposal If Russia establishes a national Bitcoin reserve, it would represent a significant milestone in the global adoption of cryptocurrency as a sovereign asset. Potential Global Impacts : Legitimizing Bitcoin as a Reserve Asset : Russia‚Äôs adoption could encourage other nations to consider Bitcoin for their reserves. Shifting Geopolitical Dynamics : Countries facing similar sanctions, such as Iran or Venezuela, may follow suit, leveraging Bitcoin to circumvent financial restrictions. Increased Demand : A national Bitcoin reserve would likely increase demand for the cryptocurrency, potentially driving prices higher. Comparisons to Other Nations‚Äô Crypto Strategies Russia‚Äôs interest in Bitcoin as a reserve asset is part of a broader trend of national governments exploring cryptocurrencies for financial resilience: 1. El Salvador El Salvador became the first country to adopt Bitcoin as legal tender in 2021, using it to boost financial inclusion and reduce remittance costs. 2. Iran Iran has used Bitcoin mining to monetize its energy resources, enabling cross-border transactions despite sanctions. 3. China Although China has banned cryptocurrency trading, it is heavily invested in blockchain technology and has launched a digital yuan to modernize its financial system. Expert Opinions on the Proposal The proposal has sparked mixed reactions from experts and stakeholders: Supporters : Argue that a Bitcoin reserve could enhance financial sovereignty and reduce dependency on traditional financial systems. Highlight Bitcoin‚Äôs potential to act as a hedge against sanctions and economic instability. Critics : Warn about the risks of price volatility and its impact on financial stability. Raise concerns about the lack of global consensus on cryptocurrency regulations, which could complicate implementation. Neutral Observers : Emphasize the need for comprehensive research and strategic planning to ensure the proposal‚Äôs success. How a Bitcoin Reserve Could Benefit Russia Despite the challenges, a national Bitcoin reserve could offer several strategic advantages for Russia: 1. Sanction Mitigation By leveraging Bitcoin‚Äôs decentralized nature, Russia could bypass traditional financial networks and continue international trade without reliance on SWIFT or other centralized systems. 2. Diversification of Reserves Adding Bitcoin to its reserves would diversify Russia‚Äôs financial assets, reducing exposure to traditional fiat currencies like the U.S. dollar. 3. Encouraging Innovation Adopting Bitcoin at the national level could stimulate growth in Russia‚Äôs blockchain and cryptocurrency sectors, attracting talent and investment. Steps Toward Implementation To establish a national Bitcoin reserve, Russia would need to take several key steps: 1. Legislative Reforms Amend existing laws to allow government entities to hold and use Bitcoin for strategic purposes. 2. Infrastructure Development Build secure custody solutions for storing Bitcoin reserves and integrating them into the financial system. 3. Risk Management Frameworks Develop strategies to mitigate price volatility and ensure the stability of reserve assets. 4. International Collaboration Work with allied nations to create a cooperative framework for using cryptocurrencies in international trade. Community and Industry Reactions The crypto community has shown keen interest in the proposal, with many viewing it as a significant step toward mainstream adoption of Bitcoin: What Industry Leaders Are Saying : Proponents : Applaud the proposal as a bold move that showcases Bitcoin‚Äôs potential as a sovereign asset. Skeptics : Caution against the risks of relying on a volatile asset for national reserves. Neutral Analysts : Highlight the importance of careful planning and international dialogue to ensure the proposal‚Äôs success. Conclusion Anton Tkachev‚Äôs proposal for a national Bitcoin reserve marks a bold and innovative approach to addressing the economic challenges posed by sanctions and financial instability. By leveraging Bitcoin‚Äôs decentralized nature and utility in international trade, Russia could strengthen its financial sovereignty and pave the way for broader adoption of digital assets at the national level. While the proposal faces challenges such as regulatory hurdles, price volatility, and international scrutiny, its potential benefits make it a compelling option for Russia and other nations exploring cryptocurrency as a strategic asset. title: 10x Research: Signs of Weak Cryptocurrency Market Momentum Signal Short-Term Consolidation
body: The cryptocurrency market, often characterized by dramatic price swings and high volatility, is currently exhibiting signs of weakening momentum. According to a report from 10x Research , shared by CoinDesk on December 10, 2024, this slowdown is likely part of a short-term consolidation phase rather than a bearish reversal. The report identifies several symptoms of this slowdown, including declining trading volumes and profit-taking by long-term holders . However, it also presents an optimistic outlook, suggesting that this period of consolidation is a healthy reset for the market, setting the stage for future growth. Markus Thielen , CEO of 10x Research, emphasizes that traders should seize this opportunity to evaluate their portfolios, focusing on outperforming assets and avoiding weaker market segments. This detailed article unpacks the findings of 10x Research, explores the causes and implications of a consolidation phase, and provides actionable strategies for navigating this transitional period in the cryptocurrency market. What Does Weak Market Momentum Look Like? The cryptocurrency market‚Äôs current behavior shows several key indicators of slowing momentum: 1. Declining Trading Volumes Trading volumes, a critical measure of market activity and liquidity, have been on a downward trend across major exchanges. Lower volumes often signify reduced investor engagement, leading to slower price movements and a lack of clear directional trends. 2. Profit-Taking by Long-Term Holders Long-term holders, who typically weather market volatility, are now locking in profits after an extended bull run. This selling pressure contributes to short-term price stagnation, as fresh buying interest is required to absorb these sales and push prices higher. 3. Sector-Specific Weakness Certain segments of the crypto market, particularly smaller or speculative altcoins, are underperforming relative to blue-chip assets like Bitcoin and Ethereum. This disparity highlights the importance of discerning between strong and weak positions during periods of consolidation. Understanding Market Consolidation According to 10x Research, the current slowdown is part of a consolidation phase , a common phenomenon in financial markets following periods of significant price appreciation. What Is Market Consolidation? Consolidation occurs when asset prices trade within a relatively narrow range, reflecting a temporary equilibrium between buying and selling pressure. Rather than a sign of weakness, consolidation often precedes the next major market move. Why Consolidation Is Beneficial : Profit-Taking Stabilizes Markets : Consolidation allows for healthy profit-taking, reducing the risk of sharp corrections. Position Re-Evaluation : Traders and investors can assess their portfolios, identify strong assets, and exit weaker positions. Foundation for Growth : This phase often lays the groundwork for the next bullish leg, particularly for assets with strong fundamentals. Historical Context: How Consolidation Has Played Out Before Consolidation phases are not new to the cryptocurrency market. They have occurred during previous bull runs and have often served as launching pads for future growth. Case Study: Bitcoin in 2021 Rally : Bitcoin experienced a massive rally in early 2021, reaching new all-time highs. Consolidation : A mid-year slowdown saw prices stabilize, with Bitcoin trading within a narrow range for several months. Recovery : The market eventually regained momentum, pushing Bitcoin to record-breaking levels by the end of the year. This cyclical behavior demonstrates the importance of viewing consolidation as a natural and often necessary part of market dynamics. Why Momentum Weakens in Bull Markets Even during extended bull markets, periods of reduced momentum are inevitable. These slowdowns are often triggered by a combination of internal and external factors: 1. Profit-Taking After sustained price increases, many investors choose to lock in gains, creating selling pressure that slows upward momentum. 2. Market Fatigue High-intensity trading during rallies can lead to temporary exhaustion among market participants, reducing overall activity. 3. Macro Events Regulatory developments, economic data releases, or geopolitical tensions can influence market sentiment, prompting a cautious approach among traders. The Role of Trading Volume in Market Analysis Trading volume is a crucial metric for gauging market health. The current decline in volumes signals hesitation among traders and investors. Why Trading Volume Matters : Indicates Interest : Higher volumes reflect active participation and robust demand for assets. Supports Price Movements : Sustained upward trends require strong volume to confirm legitimacy. Detects Reversals : A sudden drop in volume can indicate a potential shift in market sentiment. By monitoring volume trends, traders can gain valuable insights into the market‚Äôs underlying strength or weakness. 10x Research‚Äôs Strategic Recommendations Markus Thielen, CEO of 10x Research, offers actionable advice for traders navigating this period of consolidation: 1. Focus on Core Positions Traders should prioritize assets with proven track records and strong fundamentals. Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other leading cryptocurrencies are often considered safer bets during uncertain times. 2. Identify Outperforming Assets Pay attention to which assets are holding their value or gaining during the slowdown. These positions are likely to lead the market when momentum returns. 3. Avoid Weak Segments Minimize exposure to speculative or underperforming tokens that are more vulnerable to further declines during consolidation phases. 4. Stay Updated Leverage reliable market analysis tools and platforms, like 10x Research, to stay informed about emerging trends and market conditions. Opportunities Amid Consolidation While consolidation phases may seem daunting, they also present opportunities for savvy traders and investors: 1. Reposition Portfolios Use this time to exit weaker positions and increase exposure to assets with strong long-term potential. 2. Accumulate Strategic Assets Prices often stabilize or dip during consolidation, creating favorable conditions for accumulating high-quality assets. 3. Monitor Market Leaders Assets that outperform during consolidation are often the first to rally when momentum returns, making them valuable indicators for future trends. Challenges to Watch During Consolidation Despite the opportunities, traders must remain cautious and aware of potential risks: 1. Prolonged Stagnation Extended periods of low activity can erode confidence, leading to further price declines. 2. External Shocks Unexpected regulatory announcements or macroeconomic events could disrupt consolidation and trigger significant volatility. 3. Overleveraged Positions Traders using high leverage may face liquidation risks if prices move against their positions during this period. The Bull Market‚Äôs Long-Term Outlook Despite short-term consolidation, the cryptocurrency market‚Äôs long-term outlook remains bullish. Factors supporting this optimism include: 1. Institutional Adoption Major financial institutions continue to integrate cryptocurrencies into their portfolios, lending credibility and stability to the market. 2. Technological Advancements Innovations in blockchain technology, including improvements in scalability and security, enhance the utility and adoption of cryptocurrencies. 3. Macroeconomic Tailwinds Inflationary pressures and global economic uncertainty drive demand for decentralized and deflationary assets like Bitcoin. Community and Industry Reactions The findings from 10x Research have sparked significant discussions among crypto enthusiasts, traders, and analysts: Supporters : Many view this phase as a natural reset, offering opportunities to reassess strategies and accumulate quality assets. Critics : Some analysts caution against overconfidence, emphasizing the need for vigilance in an unpredictable market. Neutral Observers : Highlight the importance of staying informed and maintaining a balanced approach during consolidation. Conclusion The current signs of weakening cryptocurrency market momentum, as identified by 10x Research, represent a short-term consolidation phase rather than a bearish trend. Traders who navigate this period strategically‚Äîfocusing on core positions, monitoring outperformers, and avoiding weaker segments‚Äîcan position themselves for success when the market regains momentum. With a long-term bullish outlook driven by institutional adoption and technological advancements, the cryptocurrency market remains an exciting and dynamic space for informed investors. To learn more about the innovative startups shaping the future of the crypto industry, explore our article on the latest news , where we delve into the most promising ventures and their potential to disrupt traditional industries.

title: Analyst Explains Why Ripple And XRP Are Strategic Weapons For The United States Government
body: Presently the third most valuable cryptocurrency , XRP, remains one of the crypto market‚Äôs headliners. Its recent astronomical price performance attracted the attention of both fans and those who have long been skeptical of the Ripple-linked token. As one of the old-timers of the cryptosphere, XRP has in recent times enjoyed an ultra-bullish period after rocketing to just below the $3 mark. The XRP rally follows Donald Trump‚Äôs election victory in November, as hopes that the new administration will adopt a more lenient approach toward cryptocurrencies triggered unprecedented interest in them. After all, Trump promised on the campaign trail to make the U.S. the ‚Äúcrypto capital‚Äù of the world. Now, a popular digital asset researcher is stressing that the U.S. government could leverage Ripple and XRP as strategic weapons. Ripple And XRP Hold Strategic Importance For The US With the current chair of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC), Gary Gensler, set to step down on the day crypto-friendly President-elect Donald Trump is sworn in, analyst Anders explains why Ripple and XRP are strategically important to boost the country as the global leader in the worlds of finance and crypto. In a recent X post , Anders pointed out that Ripple has created a state-of-the-art business-to-business (B2B) system for cross-border payments. He noted that San Francisco-headquartered Ripple controls this next-generation payment solution, giving the United States an edge in the industry. Secondly, Anders suggested that Ripple‚Äôs forthcoming U.S. dollar-pegged RLUSD stablecoin could boost the adoption of the greenback by global financial institutions. It‚Äôs worth mentioning that RLUSD was scheduled to launch on Dec. 4 pending approval by the New York Department of Financial Services, but was delayed. Still, Ripple‚Äôs chief technology officer, David Schwartz, believes the long-anticipated stablecoin could potentially be launched by year-end. Once RLUSD is available, Ripple has previously indicated that it will use both the stablecoin and the XRP token in its cross-border payments solution to serve its international clients. Anders further pinpointed Ripple‚Äôs huge XRP trove as another strategic weapon for the U.S. According to the pundit, Ripple currently holds approximately 45% of all XRP supply, making the U.S.-based firm the largest holder of the third largest crypto. He emphasized the significance of accomplishment by citing one of Trump‚Äôs pre-election promises to support all U.S.-based cryptocurrency firms and tokens. ‚ÄúNo other entity in the crypto space fulfills all these points. Especially since Ripple has created a full B2B cross-border payments system AND at the same time will issue their own USD stablecoin. This is only the beginning as well, we‚Äôll see institutional DeFi products come to market, etc. Therefore Ripple holds strategic importance for the US,‚Äù Anders concluded. XRP Round 2 Imminent? The price of Ripple‚Äôs cryptocurrency, XRP, has soared over 339% over the last month. Notably, the coin was trading five times lower just a month ago, and its market cap was hovering around $30 billion. Fast-forward to today, and XRP is a $130 billion asset. Meanwhile, widely-followed crypto analyst DonAlt suggested that XRP might be preparing for a round 2, indicating that the recent breakout could well be just the beginning of a much larger rally for the coin. It remains to be seen whether XRP can finally flip Ether (ETH) with the incoming second leg of parabolic growth.

title: Top Analyst Ignores Dogecoin Price Crash: Sees DOGE Hitting $18
body: Dogecoin price has pulled back this week, remaining in a consolidation phase where it has been for almost a month. Its two-day retreat happened as Bitcoin and other altcoins suffered a harsh reversal. Still, some notable analysts believe that the current DOGE price crash will be brief and that the uptrend is still intact. Crypto Analyst Sees Dogecoin Price Rising To $18 A quick look at statements by most crypto analysts shows that many of them are highly optimistic that the Dogecoin price has room for more growth. In an X post, Ali Martinez , a popular technical and on-chain analyst, predicted that DOGE was still in a good place in its bullish cycle. He pointed to the weekly chart with a regression channel. He expects that the DOGE price will rise to about $3 in the ongoing bull run. His long-term view is that the coin will ultimately rise to $18. A move from the current price of $0.4127 to $3 would imply a 628% rally, while a surge to $18 would lead to a 4,267% gain. Scofield , another crypto analyst, predicted that the Dogecoin price would soon take off. He pointed out that it had just moved to a key support level on the four-hour chart and that it would soon bounce back. DOGE Price Forecast Dogecoin Price Technical Analysis: Needs To Flip $0.4835 The weekly chart shows that DOGE price has remained in a consolidation phase in the past few weeks. This price action happened after it rallied to a multi-year high of $0.4841, its highest level since May 2021. The price was also a few points above the 38.2% Fibonacci Retracement level at $0.4565. Dogecoin remains much higher than the key support at $0.2278, its highest level on March 25, and the upper side of the small cup and handle pattern. While it is still too early to tell, there are signs that the ongoing consolidation is part of the formation of either a bullish flag or a bullish pennant pattern. These patterns are made up of a long vertical line followed by a consolidation. If these patterns work out, it means that the Dogecoin price will have a bullish breakout, with the next logical target being at $0.7373, its all-time high. Dogecoin Price Chart On the flip side, a drop below $0.3690, the 50% retracement level will invalidate the bullish Dogecoin price forecast . Such a drop will see it drop to the psychological point at $0.300. The post Top Analyst Ignores Dogecoin Price Crash: Sees DOGE Hitting $18 appeared first on CoinGape .

title: ‚ÄúJust Keep Building‚Äù - The Narratives At DevCon 2024
body: DevCon has emerged as one of the hottest extravaganzas on the crypto calendar, bringing together the most innovative Ethereum builders, explorers, entrepreneurs and users from around the world, and the 2024 edition in Bangkok was one of the most insightful yet. If you didn‚Äôt make it to the event, don‚Äôt worry, for we caught up with a number of representatives from leading crypto companies that graced DevCon with their presence to help us define the narratives on everyone‚Äôs lips. So let‚Äôs look at a quick rundown of what everyone was talking about, and how these developments will shape the future of the Ethereum ecosystem going forward. AI‚Äôs Intersection With Crypto One of the major themes throughout the event was the rise of AI, and attendees were only too eager to elaborate on the ways that technology will be integrated into blockchain and DeFi especially, with a focus on expanding access and automation. ‚ÄúAI agents have emerged as one of the most likely use cases, starting with social media avatars and later, leading to all sorts of personalized agents,‚Äù said Ken Timsit, managing director of Cronos Labs. Himanshu Tyagi, co-founder of Sentient said she thinks most attendees will remember Devcon 2024 as the conference that marked the beginning of the rise of crypto and AI. ‚ÄúThere was a lot of excitement around social bots connected to crypto rails, interacting with the community through twitter or discord,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúThese bots will inspire the next generation of crypto products, and we need new tech to keep them aligned with communities. What‚Äôs more, I feel that next year will be completely about crypto and AI. Social bots will evolve to multiplatform, multi-AI creatures playing coordination games with the crypto community. I won't be surprised to see some regulation forbidding AI to launch tokens.‚Äù Although bots and agents were the most often-discussed use cases, Tyagi also thinks AI can also play a growing role in enhancing crypto security. Asked what he felt was the most impactful moment at DevCon, he highlighted the release of OML 1.0 fingerprinting library of Sentient at the Open AGI summit. ‚ÄúThese fingerprints will evolve to be the foundational blocks for Model Loyalty, making sure that the model can be controlled and kept aligned with the community,‚Äù he promised. Security Still A Major Focus As always, the need for better security systems in crypto was ever-present on the DevCon agenda, and attendees were encouraged by a number of developments that suggest progress is being made. Nelly Cornejo, CMO at iExec , said the highlight of the event was a talk about the impact of TEEs (Trusted Execution Environments) and how they can help further decentralization of Ethereum. ‚ÄúTEEs have the potential to push the protocol to its edges,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúWhen paired with other cryptographic approaches, we can achieve this level of decentralization without giving excessive power to manufacturers.That‚Äôs why, since 2018, we at iExec have been leading the charge in combining Confidential Computing with blockchain technology. It‚Äôs incredibly exciting to see this space evolve, with more and more use cases being discovered and developed.‚Äù dRPC CEO Constantine Zaitcev said an interesting point was made during the "Abstract Bangkok Panel‚Äù discussion involving Vitalik Buterin and other prominent crypto leaders on the topic of account abstraction. ‚ÄúThis conversation not only highlighted Ethereum‚Äôs commitment to decentralization but also showcased how technical advancements like Schnorr signatures can significantly improve user experiences in areas such as wallet security and usability‚Äã,‚Äù he said. Zaitcev is also optimistic about increased regulation in the crypto industry. ‚ÄúIt will lead to clearer frameworks, balancing innovation with compliance,‚Äù he explained. ‚ÄúThis will foster more institutional adoption while addressing concerns around data privacy and security‚Äã.‚Äù L2 Networks Gather Momentum Layer-2 networks were easily the most commonly recurring theme at DevCon. Cornejo said it has become clear to everyone in the Ethereum community that infrastructure is the key to scaling and usability. ‚ÄúScaling upgrades have significantly lowered transaction costs‚Äîsometimes by as much as 99%,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúFor example, back in 2021, Ethereum transactions involving USDC averaged around $12 in gas fees. By September this year, that dropped to about $1 on Ethereum and less than a cent on Base, Coinbase‚Äôs L2 network. This is a massive improvement, especially when compared to the $44 average cost of international wire transfers today. Cronos Labs‚Äô Timsit said his company‚Äôs side event, hosted alongside Google Cloud, ZKSync and others has made it clear that interoperable L2 blockchains are going to get even more attention in the New Year. ‚ÄúL2s, particularly zero-knowledge L2s, are going to become the priority solutions for growing Ethereum‚Äôs ecosystem in 2025,‚Äù he predicted. According to Zaitcev, there are lots of reasons to be excited about L2s, but the most pressing benefit is prices and cost optimization. ‚ÄúThe continued rise of layer-2 solutions and zero-knowledge proofs (ZKPs) will make blockchain interactions more affordable and efficient, with dynamic pricing models for infrastructure services becoming standard‚Äã,‚Äù he promised. Cornejo believes L2s themselves are already having this impact, and are one of the major reasons why blockchains in general are growing so rapidly. ‚ÄúBlockchains are now processing more than 50 times the volume they could just four years ago, thanks to Ethereum‚Äôs Layer 2 solutions, high-throughput blockchains, and the ETH Dencun upgrade, which drastically reduced fees for L2 networks,‚Äù he stated. Priorities Will Shift The emergence of so many prominent L2 networks has led to a lot of rivalries between them, with the likes of ZK rollups and optimistic rollups all competing for users and trying to outdo each other. But in the coming year, Mark Smargon of Fuse.io thinks those networks will be much less focused on each other, and much more aware of where the real competition is. ‚ÄúRight now, people are thinking about past problems that might be interesting for our investors, instead of considering future problems that we can solve for our consumers,‚Äù Smargon said. ‚ÄúThere is too much debate about L2's competing with each other, and how Ethereum is competing with Solana. In a year from now I predict we will not hear about those competitions because we need to grow the pie and once we do that, crypto will get 100-times bigger and every team will realize that their main competition is Web2.‚Äù The Memecoin Hype Will Expand No Ethereum roadshow these days is complete without a mention of memecoins, and Cornejo believes they will continue to grow as a force on Ethereum, as there are no signs of the hype around them letting up. ‚ÄúMemecoins continue to gain popularity in this cycle,‚Äù Cornejo said. ‚ÄúGoogle Trends shows that searches for "meme coin" and "meme coins" are at their highest levels in five years. Pump.fun also reached a record with 69,046 new tokens launched in a single day. However, it‚Äôs crucial to remain cautious as market conditions evolve. As Keynes famously said, ‚ÄúMarkets can remain irrational longer than you can remain solvent.‚Äù‚ÄùNate Holiday, CEO of Space and Time, captured the essence of the post-Devcon 2024 Space and Time with his succinct yet powerful statement:‚ÄúETH is still king for developers. Ignore the noise. Keep building.‚Äù His words reflect the overarching mood among the Ethereum community and Web3 developers, emphasising Ethereum's enduring dominance as the foundational blockchain for innovation and development. Despite the rise of competing ecosystems and the noise surrounding new narratives, Holiday‚Äôs message underscores a key takeaway from Devcon: Ethereum remains the go-to platform for developers seeking robust infrastructure, active community support, and a mature ecosystem. Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice

title: Bitcoin Miners Cipher, CleanSpark and MARA's Upgraded at JPMorgan
body: Wall Street giant JPMorgan (JPM) turned more bullish on some bitcoin (BTC) mining stocks in its coverage following third quarter results and recent gains in bitcoin price and the network hashrate, the bank said in a report on Tuesday. The bank upgraded Cipher Mining (CIFR) and CleanSpark (CLSK) to overweight from neutral. JPMorgan also introduced a new price $8 price target for Cipher, and raised its CleanSpark price target to $17 from $10.50. MARA Holdings (MARA) was also upgraded to neutral from underweight and raised its price target on the stock to $23 from $12. The U.S. bank downgraded IREN (IREN) to neutral from overweight while increasing its price target on the shares to $15 from $9.50. It raised its Riot Platforms (RIOT) price target to $16 from $9.50, while maintaining its overweight rating on the company. The bank said it was introducing a new sum-of-the-parts (SOTP) valuation framework for the miners, which took into account company's mining operations, their respective land and power portfolios, and their hodl balance to reflect any bitcoin that the firms may hold on their balance sheet. Cipher rose over 4% in early trading Tuesday, CleanSpark gained around 3.5%, MARA climbed over 2%, RIOT was almost 2% higher, and IREN was 0.4% better. Read more: Bitcoin Mining Profitability Improved in November, JPMorgan Says

body: TL;DR Some analysts highlight DOGE‚Äôs strong chart patterns and view the recent dip as a buying opportunity. After all, America‚Äôs upcoming political leader has Elon Musk in his inner circle and even appointed him to lead a new division called the Department of Government Efficiency (D.O.G.E.). The unit is expected to reduce bureaucracy, cut government spending, and enhance efficiency , with Trump describing it as ‚ÄúThe Manhattan Project‚Äù of our time. For his part, Musk is a well-known proponent of Dogecoin, often praising its merits and endorsing it on X. Earlier this year, Tesla (the EV giant spearheaded by the billionaire) integrated the meme coin as a payment method on its website. There are also rumors that X (the social media platform that Musk purchased for $44 billion in 2022) might embrace DOGE settlements sooner or later. Elon Musk‚Äôs involvement in the US political scene may positively affect DOGE‚Äôs price. However, its performance will also depend on various other factors, such as broader market trends and developments within the Dogecoin ecosystem. title: Breaking: Bitcoin Miner MARA Acquires 11,774 BTC For $1.1 Billion
body: Bitcoin miner MARA has announced the purchase of 11,774 BTC for $1.1 billion, bringing its total Bitcoin holdings to 40,435 BTC. The Bitcoin miner is the public company with the second largest Bitcoin holdings, and this announcement comes just a day after MicroStrategy, the public company with the largest BTC holding, announced another purchase. MARA Acquires 11,774 BTC For $1.1 Billion MARA revealed in a recent filing with the SEC that it had purchased 11,774 BTC for $1.1 billion. Meanwhile, the Bitcoin miner also confirmed this purchase in an X post, stating that it used the proceeds from its zero-coupon convertible notes offerings to make this purchase. The company acquired these bitcoins at an average price of $96,000 per BTC and has achieved a BTC yield of 12.3% quarter-to-date (QTD) and 47.6% year-to-date (YTD). Following this recent purchase, the Bitcoin miner now holds 40,435 BTC, worth around $3.9 billion based on the current Bitcoin price . MicroStrategy co-founder Michael Saylor also commented on MARA‚Äôs announcement, touching on the fact that the company has achieved a BTC yield of 47.6% YTD, which seemed to have impressed the tech entrepreneur and Bitcoin advocate. Interestingly, MARA Holding‚Äôs announcement comes just a day after Saylor‚Äôs company announced that it purchased 21,550 BTC for $2.1 billion. MicroStrategy and Marathon Digital are the public companies with the largest Bitcoin holdings. However, the software company is well ahead, with 423,650 BTC compared to the Bitcoin miner‚Äôs 40,435 BTC. Other companies are already looking to emulate this Bitcoin strategy, and Microsoft could soon be one of them. The company‚Äôs shareholders will vote today on a Bitcoin adoption proposal, which, if passed, would see the tech company adopt the flagship crypto on its balance sheet. The post Breaking: Bitcoin Miner MARA Acquires 11,774 BTC For $1.1 Billion appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Binance makes top 6 in Cloudflare‚Äôs DNS traffic stats for financial apps in 2024
body: San Francisco Cloudflare, Inc. released its fifth annual year in review report. The connectivity cloud company‚Äôs report goes through the most popular internet services, providing global internet insights and security trends for 2024. Binance was the crypto industry‚Äôs representative, making it into the top six. According to Cloudflare, financial services cover everything from traditional banking to crypto and tax tools. According to the 2024 report, the top six financial services are Stripe, Trading View, Alipay, PayPal, Nubank, and Binance. Cloudflare‚Äôs network presently extends across over 330 cities in over 120 regions, serving an average of over 63 million HTTP(S) requests per second for millions of Internet properties. Additionally, it manages over 42 million DNS requests per second on average. Binance makes the top six of finance applications According to Cloudflare , Binance peaked in third position on November 12-13, following the US elections. However, it settled in sixth position, up from eighth last year. On the other hand, PayPal fell to the fourth position from the second spot. Also, TradingView ascended to the second position, while AliPay, the Chinese mobile and online payment platform, secured the third position. Nubank, the Brazilian Neobank (exclusively online), entered the top 10 at the fifth position. It is regarded as the most valuable. It is one of the largest financial groups in Latin America and the world‚Äôs largest digital bank. Crypto ratings and financial impacts Cloudflare conducted a specific evaluation of services related to crypto in the financial services category. The findings are that the crypto sector has continued to develop in 2024 despite a few collapses in recent years. Crypto has also experienced a late-year boom. Binance and Coinbase maintained the top two positions, while OKX advanced to third place this year. In late August, CoinGecko was demoted to the sixth position as OKX took its place. Meanwhile, 2miners.com, a new entrant, ascended to the fourth position. CoinMarketCap ranked fifth, followed by several dynamic new entrants in the Top 10. Source: Cloudflare The overall classification was influenced by the US elections and Bitcoin‚Äôs price. Coinbase‚Äôs most successful day was November 21, when it ranked #131 as Bitcoin approached $100,000. OKX peaked at the 149th position on Nov 22 as CoinMarketCap reached the176th position on Nov 23 Also, on September 26, Binance made its debut in the Top 100 when Bitcoin surpassed $65,000. Financial attacks per Cloudflare data According to Cloudflare, the frequency of attacks in industries frequently changes over time, depending on the attackers‚Äô intentions. When their intention is financial harm, they aim at e-commerce sites during peak buying season, assault online games to gain advantages over opponents, or attack government-related sites to make political statements. To determine industry-specific attack activity in 2024, Cloudflare examined mitigated traffic for customers having an associated industry and vertical in their customer record. May was the most active month for attacks targeting finance organizations, with an upsurge of 15.3% of mitigated traffic occurring during the week of May 13. This is consistent with the figure in the Q2 2024 DDoS threat report, which indicates that the Financial Services industry was the most frequently targeted for request volume in South America and the Middle East region during the quarter. Source: Cloudflare Companies in the gambling/games industry were the most targeted in 2024, accounting for 6.6% of all global mitigated traffic. The industry was marginally ahead of Finance, which topped 2023‚Äôs aggregate rankings. Gambling and games sites saw the greatest share of reduced traffic in January and the first week of February. Land a High-Paying Web3 Job in 90 Days: The Ultimate Roadmap

Synthetix historic price sentiment Kain Warwick launched Synthetix in September 2017 under Havven (HAV). The HAV Airdrop Campaign ran between 4 and 14 February 2018 and offered two million tokens for around $1 million. On November 30, 2018, Synthetic announced its rebranding from Havven. This included renaming its native token, HAV (Havven token), to SNX. The contract address did not change. It registered its lowest price at $0.03258 on January 5, 2019. Different from most mega-altcoins, SNX did not rally after launch; it consistently traded below $0.5 until the last quarter of 2019. In 2020, it made a mega rally to $7.3. In the 2021 bull cycle, it shot higher, and on February 14, it registered its all-time high at $28.77. It reversed to $5 in July before pumping again to $15 in September. In the 2022 crypto winter, SNX shed most of its value as it retreated to the $2 mark by the end of the year. In 2023, it consistently traded between $1.5 and $3 until the last quarter, when it had its break. In March 2024, SNX reached a high of $5; in July, SNX came down from $2.01 to $1.65 range. In August 2024, SNX token‚Äôs price dipped as low as $1.20, and September saw a maximum price of $1.71. In October 2024, SNX dipped and became rangebound. It closed the month with a $1.31 price tag, while November saw a stream of improved prices through out with the coin peaking $2.63. At the start of December, SNX is trending near $2.44.

title: Binance CEO Richard Teng Stresses Compliance Amid Speculation on U.S. Return
body: Binance CEO Richard Teng has downplayed speculation about the crypto exchange‚Äôs potential return to the United States. Speaking on Bloomberg TV on December 9, Teng described any discussion of re-entering the U.S. market or relaunching Binance USD (BUSD) stablecoin as ‚Äúpremature.‚Äù ‚ÄúFor now, our focus is on global deployment,‚Äù Teng stated, highlighting the exchange‚Äôs efforts to capture market share worldwide. He noted Binance‚Äôs intention to target institutions, sovereign wealth funds, and high-net-worth individuals, whom he believes are poised to allocate more resources to the crypto sector. Binance withdrew from the U.S. in November 2023 following a $4.3 billion settlement with U.S. authorities over allegations including sanctions violations and operating without proper licensing. As part of the settlement, the Justice Department and the Treasury‚Äôs Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN) imposed independent compliance monitoring on the exchange for three and five years, respectively. Teng Backs Stronger Compliance When asked whether Binance might seek to shorten these compliance monitoring periods under President-elect Donald Trump‚Äôs crypto-friendly administration , Teng dismissed the idea as irrelevant. ‚ÄúCompliance is the way forward,‚Äù he said, emphasizing Binance‚Äôs heavy investment in compliance infrastructure as a competitive advantage in an increasingly regulated environment. Since taking over as CEO in November 2023, Teng has championed compliance and regulatory adherence, acknowledging past shortcomings under his predecessor Changpeng Zhao. ‚ÄúThere were gaps in terms of compliance,‚Äù Teng admitted in a December 2023 interview. Despite these efforts, the exchange continues to face scrutiny. Its U.S. arm, Binance.US, operates as a crypto-only exchange without the ability to transact in U.S. dollars. The SEC has accused Binance , Binance.US, and Zhao of selling unregistered securities and other regulatory breaches. Path Forward Without U.S. Markets Although Teng did not rule out a future return to the U.S., his comments made clear that Binance is prioritizing a broader global strategy . This approach comes as the industry anticipates clearer regulatory frameworks worldwide, providing an opportunity for Binance to strengthen its position across various jurisdictions. With its focus on compliance and global market expansion, Binance aims to rebuild trust and reputation amid ongoing legal challenges, while keeping its long-term options open. The post Binance CEO Richard Teng Stresses Compliance Amid Speculation on U.S. Return appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

title: CryptoAutos Announces TGE for $AUTOS Token Following Sold-Out Public Sale
body: London, United Kingdom, December 10th, 2024, Chainwire CryptoAutos , the world‚Äôs first blockchain-powered luxury automotive marketplace, has announced the Token Generation Event (TGE) for its native utility token, $AUTOS, scheduled for 11th December 2024 at 12 PM UTC. This event represents a significant development in CryptoAutos‚Äô efforts to enhance the ownership and interaction of high-value assets through blockchain technology. $AUTOS will launch at a fixed price of $0.04, representing a fully diluted valuation (FDV) of $40 million. The token will be available on the Uniswap DEX and multiple CEX‚Äôs; KuCoin and Gate.io, ensuring wide accessibility for the global community. Community Launch Achieves $4.5 Million in a Matter of Hours The TGE announcement follows a successful Community Launch on Fjord Foundry , which raised $4.5 million in just 5.5 hours, with participation from 1,710 $AUTOS buyers. This strong demand reflects interest and trust in the CryptoAutos ecosystem, which combines blockchain innovation with the exclusivity of luxury automotive ownership. Token Claims and Airdrop Distribution Details Public sale participants can claim 100% of their tokens upon TGE through CryptoAutos‚Äô simple claiming process. Detailed instructions are available in the official guide . For winners of the $AUTOS airdrop, Tokens will be automatically airdropped to the wallet connected during the Telegram game as soon as TGE goes live. The Utility and Vision of $AUTOS The $AUTOS token is integral to CryptoAutos‚Äô blockchain-powered platform, providing a seamless, secure, and efficient way to engage with high-value assets. It facilitates; Transactions: Simplifying luxury vehicle purchases without the need for traditional banking. Membership: Enabling holders to potentially earn varying levels of diverse benefits from a portfolio of luxury cars, including fee reductions, access to rentals, and access to additional incentives Governance: Empowering the community to shape the platform‚Äôs direction through decentralized voting. Buy-back and burn: Taking proceeds from marketplace place sales to strengthen the token ecosystem. RWA Platform: Participation in fractionalised ownership offerings of luxury cars and much more. Driving Solutions for Luxury on Blockchain ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre incredibly proud of the overwhelming support during our $AUTOS Community Launch event, which raised $4.5 million in just 5.5 hours‚Äù ‚ÄúThis marks the beginning of an exciting journey for us. The $AUTOS token completes the CryptoAutos market offering by enhancing transactions, staking opportunities, and community-driven governance. Together, we‚Äôre building a decentralised future for luxury ownership, with $AUTOS as the key to unlocking this vision.‚Äù said Harley Foote, Co-Founder & CEO of CryptoAutos. Key Details for the TGE Date: 11th December 2024 Time: 12 PM UTC Launch Price: $0.04 DEX: Uniswap CEX: KuCoin & Gate.io Additional updates on partnerships, tokenomics, token utility updates and future listings will be shared as CryptoAutos advances the growth of its ecosystem. About CryptoAutos CryptoAutos aims to redefine mass adoption in Web3, with a proven track record of $58M in crypto car sales, 180,000 monthly site visits, and over 120,000 whitelisted users. As a leading global automotive marketplace and Real-World Asset (RWA) platform, Crypto Autos bridges Web2 and Web3 by adding real-world utility to digital assets. Through partnerships like TON and BNB, a network of 1,500+ partnered dealerships, and exclusive $AUTOS token utilities, Crypto Autos enables seamless crypto-to-fiat transactions, fractionalized supercar ownership, and AI-powered vehicle insights. The platform is poised for significant growth by leveraging an expanding user base and unique innovations to unlock the future of mobility and crypto investment. title: CryptoAutos Announces TGE for $AUTOS Token Following Sold-Out Public Sale
body: London, United Kingdom, December 10th, 2024, Chainwire CryptoAutos , the world‚Äôs first blockchain-powered luxury automotive marketplace, has announced the Token Generation Event (TGE) for its native utility token, $AUTOS , scheduled for 11th December 2024 at 12 PM UTC . This event represents a significant development in CryptoAutos‚Äô efforts to enhance the ownership and interaction of high-value assets through blockchain technology. $AUTOS will launch at a fixed price of $0.04, representing a fully diluted valuation (FDV) of $40 million. The token will be available on the Uniswap DEX and multiple CEX‚Äôs; KuCoin and Gate.io , ensuring wide accessibility for the global community. Community Launch Achieves $4.5 Million in a Matter of Hours The TGE announcement follows a successful Community Launch on Fjord Foundry , which raised $4.5 million in just 5.5 hours , with participation from 1,710 $AUTOS buyers. This strong demand reflects interest and trust in the CryptoAutos ecosystem, which combines blockchain innovation with the exclusivity of luxury automotive ownership. Token Claims and Airdrop Distribution Details Public sale participants can claim 100% of their tokens upon TGE through CryptoAutos‚Äô simple claiming process. Detailed instructions are available in the official guide . For winners of the $AUTOS airdrop, Tokens will be automatically airdropped to the wallet connected during the Telegram game as soon as TGE goes live. The Utility and Vision of $AUTOS The $AUTOS token is integral to CryptoAutos‚Äô blockchain-powered platform, providing a seamless, secure, and efficient way to engage with high-value assets. It facilitates; Transactions: Simplifying luxury vehicle purchases without the need for traditional banking. Membership: Enabling holders to potentially earn varying levels of diverse benefits from a portfolio of luxury cars, including fee reductions, access to rentals, and access to additional incentives Governance: Empowering the community to shape the platform‚Äôs direction through decentralized voting. Buy-back and burn: Taking proceeds from marketplace place sales to strengthen the token ecosystem. RWA Platform: Participation in fractionalised ownership offerings of luxury cars and much more. Driving Solutions for Luxury on Blockchain ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre incredibly proud of the overwhelming support during our $AUTOS Community Launch event, which raised $4.5 million in just 5.5 hours‚Äù ‚ÄúThis marks the beginning of an exciting journey for us. The $AUTOS token completes the CryptoAutos market offering by enhancing transactions, staking opportunities, and community-driven governance. Together, we‚Äôre building a decentralised future for luxury ownership, with $AUTOS as the key to unlocking this vision.‚Äù said Harley Foote , Co-Founder & CEO of CryptoAutos . Key Details for the TGE Date: 11th December 2024 Time: 12 PM UTC Launch Price: $0.04 DEX: Uniswap CEX: KuCoin & Gate.io Additional updates on partnerships, tokenomics, token utility updates and future listings will be shared as CryptoAutos advances the growth of its ecosystem. About CryptoAutos CryptoAutos aims to redefine mass adoption in Web3, with a proven track record of $58M in crypto car sales, 180,000 monthly site visits, and over 120,000 whitelisted users. As a leading global automotive marketplace and Real-World Asset (RWA) platform, Crypto Autos bridges Web2 and Web3 by adding real-world utility to digital assets. Through partnerships like TON and BNB, a network of 1,500+ partnered dealerships, and exclusive $AUTOS token utilities, Crypto Autos enables seamless crypto-to-fiat transactions, fractionalized supercar ownership, and AI-powered vehicle insights. The platform is poised for significant growth by leveraging an expanding user base and unique innovations to unlock the future of mobility and crypto investment. title: Anthony Scaramucci predicts China will be back in Bitcoin ‚Äòby this time next year‚Äô
body: At the Bitcoin MENA conference in Abu Dhabi, SkyBridge Capital founder and former White House Communications Director Anthony Scaramucci made a bold prediction: China will re-enter Bitcoin by the end of 2025. Speaking with conviction at the ADNEC Centre on December 10, Scaramucci laid out his forecast: ‚ÄúNow that the United States is open to this idea, I think it would be impossible to suggest that other countries wouldn‚Äôt do the same thing. I‚Äôm sitting here today in December 2024. I‚Äôll make a prediction here: By this time next year, the Chinese will be back in the Bitcoin game.‚Äù He added : ‚ÄúThey‚Äôre probably going to add it to their reserve assets. They‚Äôre probably going to allow people to mine it legally.‚Äù Scaramucci‚Äôs insights carry significant weight, given his background in both traditional finance and cryptocurrency investment. As the founder of the global investment firm SkyBridge Capital, Scaramucci has been a vocal advocate for Bitcoin‚Äôs role in the future of finance and the presence of digital assets. China‚Äôs complicated relationship with Bitcoin China‚Äôs history with Bitcoin and crypto has been tumultuous. The country was once the epicenter of Bitcoin mining, accounting for as much as 65% to 75% of global hash power before the Chinese Communist Party (CCP) imposed a sweeping ban on cryptocurrency mining and trading in 2021. The ban was part of a broader effort to curb financial risks, regulate capital outflows, and promote China‚Äôs own central bank digital currency (CBDC), the digital yuan. Despite the crackdown, Scaramucci highlighted a significant anomaly in the enforcement of the ban. Many miners have relocated their operations to more crypto-friendly jurisdictions, but a notable percentage of activity still continues in China. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs ironic‚Äî10% of the mining is still happening in China despite the fact the CCP has disallowed it,‚Äù he remarked. Geopolitical dynamics and the U.S. influence Scaramucci‚Äôs prediction is rooted in the shifting global landscape around Bitcoin. The United States has taken steps toward embracing digital assets, with growing institutional adoption and increasing discussions about regulatory clarity. High-profile events like the potential approval of Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) and greater recognition of cryptocurrencies in financial systems are setting the stage for wider global adoption. Scaramucci elaborated on this trend, saying: ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre going to see this opening. It‚Äôs almost like a match sailing race. You‚Äôre not going to be in a position in the world, in developing economies, where the U.S. is moving towards Bitcoin and you are not moving towards Bitcoin.‚Äù In other words, Scaramucci believes that if the U.S. continues to integrate Bitcoin into its financial system, other major economies‚Äîincluding China‚Äîwill feel compelled to follow suit. The competitive nature of global finance and the desire to maintain economic dominance may drive China to reconsider its stance on Bitcoin. Finbold‚Äôs two cents on Scaramucci‚Äôs forecast Given Anthony Scaramucci‚Äôs proven track record and deep connections in high-level financial networks, his insights carry significant weight. Especially as someone who has successfully navigated both Wall Street and the political sphere. If his forecast proves correct, China‚Äôs re-entry into the Bitcoin market could have profound implications, driving up demand, legitimizing Bitcoin further, and potentially altering the global balance of financial power. The post Anthony Scaramucci predicts China will be back in Bitcoin ‚Äòby this time next year‚Äô appeared first on Finbold .

title: Elon Musk‚Äôs Call for Government Efficiency Sparks Optimism for DOGE, Investors Eye $1.05 Rally
body: The post Elon Musk‚Äôs Call for Government Efficiency Sparks Optimism for DOGE, Investors Eye $1.05 Rally appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News In a latest X post, Elon Musk has yet again caught the attention of the market participants regarding the newly established Department of Government Efficiency, which aims to cut federal government spending while making government departments more efficient at lower costs. Notably, it has gained significant attention post-Trump‚Äôs win. Time to clean up this humongous mess! https://t.co/90RtL0vIsq ‚Äî Elon Musk (@elonmusk) December 10, 2024 ‚ÄúTime to clean up this humongous mess‚Äù noted Musk. He reiterated the sentiment shared by DOGE that the Federal government spends 80% of its annual $100 billion IT budget on maintaining outdated systems. Earlier, he had raised similar issues regarding the excess federal spending, highlighting the need to cut costs. ‚ÄúNot only are older systems more expensive to maintain, but they are also more vulnerable to hackers,‚Äù read the message, that was shared by the official DOGE account. US Government‚Äôs IT Infrastructure Concerns In a seperate X post , Musk had shared that the Federal government computers & software are in such bad shape that they often cannot verify that payments are not fraud, waste or abuse.¬†Musk has been vocal about the alarming state of the US government‚Äôs IT infrastructure. He further added ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs why the government can‚Äôt pass basic audits. They often LITERALLY don‚Äôt know where your tax dollars went. It‚Äôs insane.‚Äù To support his concerns, Musk referenced a 2019 government watchdog report that identified 10 federal IT systems as outdated. The report highlighted that maintaining these systems costs approximately $337 million annually and that their continued use exposes the government to ‚Äúknown security vulnerabilities.‚Äù Musk argued that these challenges hinder effective governance and accountability. ‚ÄúThe Volunteer IT Consultant‚Äù Musk revealed that his preferred title in the new administration is ‚ÄòVolunteer IT Consultant‚Äô. He emhasized the need to fix the IT infrastructure to make the government work. ‚ÄúThis is a grind & hardly glorious, but we can‚Äôt make government efficient & fix the deficit if the computers don‚Äôt work,‚Äù he shared.¬†After winning the US Presidential election, Donald Trump appointed Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy to lead the department, sparking discussions in the market. Musk‚Äôs recent comments have also sparked optimism among investors over Dogecoin, as evidenced by the surge in the recent Dogecoin price. Also, Musk has shared a series of cryptic posts recently, which has also pushed the DOGE price higher. Meanwhile, the market experts appear to have remained bullish on the top dog-themed meme coin despite the recent pullback. Experts predict Dogecoin price rally to $1.05 in the coming days.

title: 5 Best Altcoins for 2025: Tron, XRP, Cardano, Solana, Rexas Finance (RXS)
body: The post 5 Best Altcoins for 2025: Tron, XRP, Cardano, Solana, Rexas Finance (RXS) appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News As we approach 2025, the crypto market offers immense opportunities for investors seeking massive returns. Altcoins have gained significant attention for their innovative uses and strong adoption rates. However, five altcoins stand out as the best choice for 2025. They are Rexas Finance (RXS), Tron (TRX), Ripple (XRP), Cardano (ADA), and Solano (SOL). Tron (TRX): Leader in USDT Usage Tron has increased by up to 100% in the past month and 200% this year, highlighting its growth. The cryptocurrency attracted significant interest recently following the surge that temporarily pushed its market cap to $36 billion. Whales are demonstrating confidence in Tron‚Äôs future, with whale activities skyrocketing by 929%. CryptoQuant CEO Ki Young Ju recently highlighted Tron‚Äôs key role in the crypto space. According to him, Tron leads USDT transactions with its low cost and fast transfers. The USDT Tron holds more than three times its market cap. Its strong position as a leader in USDT usage set the stage for its growth in 2025, supported by a bullish narrative. Ripple (XRP): A Promising Path to $7 Ripple gained rapidly in November, quickly tripling its value in just one month. After more than 300% in a month, XRP peaked at $2.7. However, Ripple‚Äôs executives announcement that it‚Äôs still awaiting approval for its stablecoin launch has led to a dip. This was in response to speculation that it would launch on December 4. At press time, XRP trades at $2.30. Despite this fall, XRP is poised for further gains in December and beyond. Factors like Gary Gensler‚Äôs exit, the launch of its stablecoin, and the expected launch of the Ripple XRP ETF will fuel its surge. title: Flashbots Migrates To Decentralized Block Production Software, BuilderNet
body: Flashbots, a research and development team specializing in maximal extractable value (MEV) infrastructure, has adopted decentralized infrastructure to facilitate Ethereum block production. On Dec. 8, Flashbots announced it had deprecated its centralized block building infrastructure and migrated orderflow onto its decentralized BuilderNet software, which was deployed on Nov. 26. ‚ÄúBlock building must be made decentralized, uncensorable, and neutral,‚Äù Flashbots said. ‚ÄúBuilderNet will make Ethereum more resilient by introducing a neutral way for many parties to share orderflow and collaborate in building blocks.‚Äù To continue reading this as well as other DeFi and Web3 news, visit us at thedefiant.io

title: Cardano Follows 2020 Bullish Pattern ‚Äì Top Analyst Plans To Take Profits Between $4 And $6
body: Cardano (ADA) faced a 23% retrace from its local highs yesterday, following a volatile day that saw many altcoins lose ground. Despite the correction, ADA has been one of the top-performing altcoins since November 5, showcasing its resilience amid market fluctuations. Investors remain optimistic that Cardano will continue outperforming as the broader crypto market gains momentum. Related Reading: PEPE Whales Increased Their Holdings By $1.4 Billion Yesterday ‚Äì Details Top analyst Ali Martinez shared a technical analysis on X, highlighting striking similarities between ADA‚Äôs current price chart and its 2020 performance‚Äîa year marked a bullish phase for altcoins. According to Martinez, this resemblance suggests Cardano might be gearing up for another significant rally. However, the next few weeks will be critical for confirming this trajectory, particularly as Bitcoin continues to drive the market with its strong upward momentum. The interplay between Bitcoin‚Äôs performance and altcoin activity will be pivotal in shaping ADA‚Äôs price action. If Bitcoin sustains its bullish cycle, altcoins like Cardano will likely ‚Äúwake up‚Äù and follow suit. For ADA, holding above key support levels and breaking back toward its recent highs will be essential to sustain investor confidence and set the stage for a potential breakout as the market evolves. Cardano Rally Could Continue Cardano has delivered an extraordinary performance since November 5, surging over 300% in under a month. This impressive rally has captured the attention of investors and analysts, making ADA one of the standout performers in the altcoin market. However, the recent sharp drop has sparked concerns about the potential for a deeper correction, leaving many investors on edge. Analyst and investor Ali Martinez recently shared an optimistic perspective on ADA‚Äôs trajectory via X. According to Martinez, Cardano‚Äôs current price action mirrors its behavior during 2020, preceding a massive bull run. Martinez acknowledges the possibility of a dip to $0.76 but views it as a buying opportunity, underscoring his confidence by stating his plans to book profits between $4 and $6. His analysis suggests that the current pullback is a natural part of ADA‚Äôs larger bullish cycle rather than a signal of weakness. Related Reading: Dogecoin Pressing Range Highs ‚Äì Can Bulls Push DOGE To ATH? Despite the recent retrace, key metrics and positive market sentiment support the case for ADA‚Äôs upward trajectory. Cardano‚Äôs robust performance over the past month highlights its resilience, and many investors remain optimistic about its long-term potential. As the crypto market evolves, ADA‚Äôs ability to hold key support levels and regain momentum will be critical in determining its next move. Price Holding Above Key Level Cardano (ADA) is trading at $1.01 after experiencing a sharp 20% dip yesterday. Despite this significant pullback, ADA has demonstrated resilience, holding firm above the critical support level of $0.87. This level has proven to be a strong foundation for ADA‚Äôs price action, suggesting that the asset remains well-positioned for further upward momentum. For ADA to continue its bullish trajectory, it must maintain its position above $0.90 in the coming days, solidifying investor confidence. However, the next critical milestone lies at the $1.25 resistance level. Breaking above this threshold will be crucial for ADA, as it would signal renewed buying interest and a potential continuation of its rally. Related Reading: Dogecoin Sees Quiet Breakout As Data Signals Rally Continuation Should ADA successfully hold above $0.90 and breach the $1.25 mark, the stage will be set for a massive continuation in its price. Such a move could attract more investors and further solidify ADA‚Äôs position as a top-performing altcoin. With the broader crypto market showing signs of strength, the coming weeks will be pivotal for ADA as it attempts to recover from recent volatility and push toward new highs. title: Here‚Äôs why this new Pepecoin price is soaring
body: Pepecoin Network price has gone parabolic and reached a record high as demand for the recently launched token surged. Pepecoin Network ( PEP ), a Dogecoin ( DOGE ) hard fork, climbed to a high of $0.001736, pushing its market cap to over $151 million. The token has increased by over 3,000% since its launch in January this year. PEP‚Äôs surge has coincided with the recent rally of Pepe ( PEPE ), the third-largest meme coin in the crypto industry. Pepe has gained over 1,600% this year, and this week, its market cap rose to $10 billion. Pepecoin Network also saw gains as some crypto exchanges began listing the token. It was listed by CoinEx Global, a crypto exchange that handled over $953 million worth of coins on Dec. 10. CoinEx is the first mainstream exchange to list PEP, with others including XeggeX and Nonkyc. This development increases the odds that other exchanges such as Binance, MEXC, OKX, and Bybit may add it if the token continues to gain traction. üì¢ #NewListing ‚Äì $PEP üóÇ @PepecoinNetwork was created for one purpose, to create a new and fun community just like the original #Dogecoin community. Pepecoin is a layer 1 blockchain, not an ERC20 token. There are no confusing smart contracts that can be used by bad actors to‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/7s2y2yvub5 ‚Äî CoinEx Global (@coinexcom) December 10, 2024 Pepecoin Network is significantly different from Pepe in that it operates as a proof-of-work cryptocurrency that originated from a Dogecoin hard fork. A hard fork occurs when developers create a new coin from an existing one. For example, Bitcoin forked into Bitcoin Cash, while Ethereum forked into Ethereum Classic. Pepecoin, therefore, shares some features with other proof-of-work coins like Bitcoin. For instance, it has a halving mechanism that periodically reduces block rewards. Its third halving occured in November, and the next one is expected on Feb. 3 . Pepecoin aims to become the main currency for the Pepe ecosystem by offering low transaction costs. Additionally, unlike Pepe, it operates on its own blockchain, enhancing its security. You might also like: Here‚Äôs how this trader turned $3,000 into $73m with PEPE What next for the Pepecoin Network? Pepecoin Network price chart | Source: CoinGecko The PEP price has jumped sharply this month as attention shifted to Pepe‚Äôs entry into the $10 billion market cap club. This momentum has sparked more interest from investors, with its X page gaining users and its r/Pepecoin subreddit attracting over 18,000 followers. There is a strong possibility that Pepecoin Network will continue rising as long as the main Pepe token performs well. If this trend persists, the token could soar and reach a $500 million market cap during this bull run. A key driver for this growth would be the potential listing by more exchanges. Conversely, a drop below $0.0010 would invalidate the bullish outlook. You might also like: PEPE continues its rally despite whale selloff

title: Official Approval for ETFs Including Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum Comes from Argentina!
body: Argentina, which became a Bitcoin (BTC) and cryptocurrency friend with the election of President Javier Milei, has achieved another first for itself. Accordingly, the Argentine securities regulator CNV has officially allowed certain crypto ETF-related foreign investment products to enter the domestic market. Argentine securities regulator CNV has approved the use of foreign investment funds in multiple cryptocurrency ETF opportunities, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH) gold and Chinese stock indices. Related News: New Breakthrough from Bitcoin (BTC) Friendly Argentina! A First Was Signed With This Altcoin! With this approval, Argentine citizens will now be able to invest in foreign products including gold and Chinese stocks, including Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs. Roberto Silva, the head of Argentina's Securities Regulatory Authority, described the approval as a historic development for the country. ‚ÄúThrough these initiatives, we are elevating Argentina to the standards of the most advanced international markets. Argentines will now be able to invest in digital assets such as Bitcoin and Ethereum through traditional brokerages. In the past, this was only available in the US.‚Äù *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Official Approval for ETFs Including Bitcoin (BTC) and Ethereum Comes from Argentina!

title: Robert Kiyosaki Predicts Biggest Crash Ahead Urging Investors To Buy Bitcoin
body: Rich Dad Poor Dad author Robert Kiyosaki has once again sparked discussions in the broader financial market with his recent X post. In his social media post, the renowned author predicted a potential financial market crash, which weighed on the traders‚Äô sentiment amid the recent market selloff. Besides, he also urged investors to shift focus from traditional assets like stocks, bonds, etc. to risk-bet assets like Bitcoin, gold, and others. Robert Kiyosaki Urges Caution For Boomers In a recent post on X, Kiyosaki expressed his concern about the financial vulnerability of baby ‚Äúboomers‚Äù as market conditions evolve. He argued that past trends like the real estate boom in the 1970s and stock market gains fueled by 401(k) plans have set unrealistic expectations. ‚ÄúWhen the stock market bursts, boomers will be the biggest losers,‚Äù he warned, emphasizing the need for a drastic financial shift. In addition, Kiyosaki urged younger generations to advise their parents to sell high-value assets, such as real estate and stocks, while prices remain favorable. He predicted these markets would soon face significant downturns. ‚ÄúThe biggest crash in history is coming. Please be proactive and get rich before boomers go bust,‚Äù he said urging investors to buy Bitcoin, gold, and silver. This comment, amid the recent crypto market crash , highlights his trust in Bitcoin as a hedge against the anticipated collapse. Meanwhile, this isn‚Äôt the first time Kiyosaki has championed alternative investments. He has consistently advocated for Bitcoin, highlighting its potential to weather macroeconomic hurdles. However, his latest advice arrives amid increased volatility, with a $1.7 billion crypto market liquidation wave sparking concerns about broader market fragility. A Closer Look Into The Stock Market Kiyosaki‚Äôs dire forecast contrasts sharply with the current performance of the U.S. stock market. According to The Kobeissi Letter, the S&P 500 is on track for a historic 14th year of outperforming global markets. The index has risen 446% since 2009, far surpassing the 229% gain of the MSCI World Index. Source: The Kobeissi Letter, X Additionally, U.S. retirement savings accounts have flourished. The number of 401(k) millionaires reached 544,000 in Q3 2024, a 56% increase from the previous year. Despite this, nearly 40% of workers lack access to retirement savings plans, highlighting a growing wealth divide. Source: The Kobeissi Letter, X However, Kiyosaki‚Äôs outlook challenges the optimism surrounding these gains. He believes traditional assets are unsustainable in the long term and warns of devastating consequences if investors fail to diversify. His focus on Bitcoin, along with other hard assets like gold and silver, reflects his belief in their enduring value amid economic turmoil. The post Robert Kiyosaki Predicts Biggest Crash Ahead Urging Investors To Buy Bitcoin appeared first on CoinGape .
